      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="852"></td>
        <td id="LC852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evil, but to take on the Father of Evil himself would, perhaps, be too</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ambitious a task. Yet you must admit that the footmark is material.”</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="854"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="855"></td>
        <td id="LC855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The original hound was material enough to tug a man’s throat out, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="856"></td>
        <td id="LC856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet he was diabolical as well.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="857"></td>
        <td id="LC857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="858"></td>
        <td id="LC858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I see that you have quite gone over to the supernaturalists. But now,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="859"></td>
        <td id="LC859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dr. Mortimer, tell me this. If you hold these views, why have you come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="860"></td>
        <td id="LC860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to consult me at all? You tell me in the same breath that it is useless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="861"></td>
        <td id="LC861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to investigate Sir Charles’s death, and that you desire me to do it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="862"></td>
        <td id="LC862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="863"></td>
        <td id="LC863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I did not say that I desired you to do it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="864"></td>
        <td id="LC864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="865"></td>
        <td id="LC865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then, how can I assist you?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="866"></td>
        <td id="LC866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="867"></td>
        <td id="LC867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“By advising me as to what I should do with Sir Henry Baskerville, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="868"></td>
        <td id="LC868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrives at Waterloo Station”--Dr. Mortimer looked at his watch--“in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="869"></td>
        <td id="LC869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exactly one hour and a quarter.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="870"></td>
        <td id="LC870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="871"></td>
        <td id="LC871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He being the heir?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="872"></td>
        <td id="LC872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="873"></td>
        <td id="LC873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes. On the death of Sir Charles we inquired for this young gentleman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="874"></td>
        <td id="LC874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and found that he had been farming in Canada. From the accounts which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="875"></td>
        <td id="LC875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have reached us he is an excellent fellow in every way. I speak now not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="876"></td>
        <td id="LC876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as a medical man but as a trustee and executor of Sir Charles’s will.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="877"></td>
        <td id="LC877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="878"></td>
        <td id="LC878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There is no other claimant, I presume?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="879"></td>
        <td id="LC879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="880"></td>
        <td id="LC880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“None. The only other kinsman whom we have been able to trace was Rodger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="881"></td>
        <td id="LC881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Baskerville, the youngest of three brothers of whom poor Sir Charles was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="882"></td>
        <td id="LC882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the elder. The second brother, who died young, is the father of this lad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="883"></td>
        <td id="LC883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Henry. The third, Rodger, was the black sheep of the family. He came of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="884"></td>
        <td id="LC884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the old masterful Baskerville strain and was the very image, they tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="885"></td>
        <td id="LC885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, of the family picture of old Hugo. He made England too hot to hold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="886"></td>
        <td id="LC886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, fled to Central America, and died there in 1876 of yellow fever.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="887"></td>
        <td id="LC887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Henry is the last of the Baskervilles. In one hour and five minutes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="888"></td>
        <td id="LC888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I meet him at Waterloo Station. I have had a wire that he arrived at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="889"></td>
        <td id="LC889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Southampton this morning. Now, Mr. Holmes, what would you advise me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="890"></td>
        <td id="LC890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do with him?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="891"></td>
        <td id="LC891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="892"></td>
        <td id="LC892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why should he not go to the home of his fathers?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="893"></td>
        <td id="LC893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="894"></td>
        <td id="LC894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It seems natural, does it not? And yet, consider that every Baskerville</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="895"></td>
        <td id="LC895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who goes there meets with an evil fate. I feel sure that if Sir Charles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="896"></td>
        <td id="LC896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could have spoken with me before his death he would have warned me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="897"></td>
        <td id="LC897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against bringing this, the last of the old race, and the heir to great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="898"></td>
        <td id="LC898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wealth, to that deadly place. And yet it cannot be denied that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="899"></td>
        <td id="LC899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prosperity of the whole poor, bleak countryside depends upon his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="900"></td>
        <td id="LC900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presence. All the good work which has been done by Sir Charles will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="901"></td>
        <td id="LC901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crash to the ground if there is no tenant of the Hall. I fear lest I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="902"></td>
        <td id="LC902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be swayed too much by my own obvious interest in the matter, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="903"></td>
        <td id="LC903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that is why I bring the case before you and ask for your advice.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="904"></td>
        <td id="LC904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="905"></td>
        <td id="LC905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes considered for a little time.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="906"></td>
        <td id="LC906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="907"></td>
        <td id="LC907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Put into plain words, the matter is this,” said he. “In your opinion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="908"></td>
        <td id="LC908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is a diabolical agency which makes Dartmoor an unsafe abode for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="909"></td>
        <td id="LC909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Baskerville--that is your opinion?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="910"></td>
        <td id="LC910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="911"></td>
        <td id="LC911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“At least I might go the length of saying that there is some evidence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="912"></td>
        <td id="LC912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that this may be so.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="913"></td>
        <td id="LC913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="914"></td>
        <td id="LC914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Exactly. But surely, if your supernatural theory be correct, it could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="915"></td>
        <td id="LC915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work the young man evil in London as easily as in Devonshire. A devil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="916"></td>
        <td id="LC916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with merely local powers like a parish vestry would be too inconceivable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="917"></td>
        <td id="LC917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a thing.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="918"></td>
        <td id="LC918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="919"></td>
        <td id="LC919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You put the matter more flippantly, Mr. Holmes, than you would probably</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="920"></td>
        <td id="LC920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do if you were brought into personal contact with these things. Your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="921"></td>
        <td id="LC921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advice, then, as I understand it, is that the young man will be as safe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="922"></td>
        <td id="LC922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in Devonshire as in London. He comes in fifty minutes. What would you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="923"></td>
        <td id="LC923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recommend?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="924"></td>
        <td id="LC924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="925"></td>
        <td id="LC925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I recommend, sir, that you take a cab, call off your spaniel who is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="926"></td>
        <td id="LC926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scratching at my front door, and proceed to Waterloo to meet Sir Henry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="927"></td>
        <td id="LC927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Baskerville.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="928"></td>
        <td id="LC928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="929"></td>
        <td id="LC929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And then?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="930"></td>
        <td id="LC930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="931"></td>
        <td id="LC931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And then you will say nothing to him at all until I have made up my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="932"></td>
        <td id="LC932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind about the matter.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="933"></td>
        <td id="LC933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="934"></td>
        <td id="LC934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How long will it take you to make up your mind?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="935"></td>
        <td id="LC935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="936"></td>
        <td id="LC936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Twenty-four hours. At ten o’clock tomorrow, Dr. Mortimer, I will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="937"></td>
        <td id="LC937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much obliged to you if you will call upon me here, and it will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="938"></td>
        <td id="LC938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of help to me in my plans for the future if you will bring Sir Henry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="939"></td>
        <td id="LC939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Baskerville with you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="940"></td>
        <td id="LC940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="941"></td>
        <td id="LC941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I will do so, Mr. Holmes.” He scribbled the appointment on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="942"></td>
        <td id="LC942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shirt-cuff and hurried off in his strange, peering, absent-minded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="943"></td>
        <td id="LC943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fashion. Holmes stopped him at the head of the stair.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="944"></td>
        <td id="LC944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="945"></td>
        <td id="LC945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Only one more question, Dr. Mortimer. You say that before Sir Charles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="946"></td>
        <td id="LC946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Baskerville’s death several people saw this apparition upon the moor?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="947"></td>
        <td id="LC947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="948"></td>
        <td id="LC948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Three people did.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="949"></td>
        <td id="LC949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="950"></td>
        <td id="LC950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Did any see it after?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="951"></td>
        <td id="LC951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="952"></td>
        <td id="LC952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have not heard of any.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="953"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1050"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1144"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1145"></td>
        <td id="LC1145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, yes,” said he, “and the strange thing is, Mr. Sherlock Holmes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC1240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1241"></td>
        <td id="LC1241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If any possible doubt remained it is settled by the fact that ‘keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1242"></td>
        <td id="LC1242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away’ and ‘from the’ are cut out in one piece.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1243"></td>
        <td id="LC1243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1244"></td>
        <td id="LC1244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, now--so it is!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1245"></td>
        <td id="LC1245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1246"></td>
        <td id="LC1246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Really, Mr. Holmes, this exceeds anything which I could have imagined,”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1247"></td>
        <td id="LC1247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> said Dr. Mortimer, gazing at my friend in amazement. “I could understand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1248"></td>
        <td id="LC1248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anyone saying that the words were from a newspaper; but that you should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1249"></td>
        <td id="LC1249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">name which, and add that it came from the leading article, is really one</td>

        <td id="L1250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1250"></td>
        <td id="LC1250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the most remarkable things which I have ever known. How did you do</td>

        <td id="LC1251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it?”</td>

        <td id="L1252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1252"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1253"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of an Esquimau?”</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1263"></td>
        <td id="LC1263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But this is my special hobby, and the differences are equally obvious.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1264"></td>
        <td id="LC1264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is as much difference to my eyes between the leaded bourgeois type</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1265"></td>

        <td id="LC1267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">types is one of the most elementary branches of knowledge to the special</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1274"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC1279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away.’”</td>

        <td id="L1280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1280"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1283"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1284"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1285"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1286"></td>
        <td id="LC1286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“With gum on to the paper. But I want to know why the word ‘moor’ should</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1287"></td>

        <td id="L1288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1288"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC1289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Because he could not find it in print. The other words were all simple</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1290"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1291"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1292"></td>
        <td id="LC1292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, of course, that would explain it. Have you read anything else in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1293"></td>
        <td id="LC1293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this message, Mr. Holmes?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1294"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1295"></td>
        <td id="LC1295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There are one or two indications, and yet the utmost pains have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1296"></td>
        <td id="LC1296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taken to remove all clues. The address, you observe is printed in rough</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1297"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1298"></td>
        <td id="LC1298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but those of the highly educated. We may take it, therefore, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1299"></td>
        <td id="LC1299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the letter was composed by an educated man who wished to pose as an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1300"></td>
        <td id="LC1300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uneducated one, and his effort to conceal his own writing suggests that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1301"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1302"></td>
        <td id="LC1302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will observe that the words are not gummed on in an accurate line, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1303"></td>
        <td id="LC1303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that some are much higher than others. ‘Life,’ for example is quite out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1304"></td>
        <td id="LC1304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of its proper place. That may point to carelessness or it may point to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1305"></td>
        <td id="LC1305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agitation and hurry upon the part of the cutter. On the whole I incline</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1306"></td>
        <td id="LC1306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the latter view, since the matter was evidently important, and it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1307"></td>
        <td id="LC1307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is unlikely that the composer of such a letter would be careless. If he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1308"></td>
        <td id="LC1308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were in a hurry it opens up the interesting question why he should be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1309"></td>
        <td id="LC1309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a hurry, since any letter posted up to early morning would reach</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1310"></td>
        <td id="LC1310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sir Henry before he would leave his hotel. Did the composer fear an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1311"></td>
        <td id="LC1311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interruption--and from whom?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1312"></td>
        <td id="LC1312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1313"></td>
        <td id="LC1313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We are coming now rather into the region of guesswork,” said Dr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1314"></td>
        <td id="LC1314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mortimer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1315"></td>
        <td id="LC1315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1316"></td>
        <td id="LC1316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Say, rather, into the region where we balance probabilities and choose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1317"></td>
        <td id="LC1317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the most likely. It is the scientific use of the imagination, but we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1318"></td>
        <td id="LC1318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have always some material basis on which to start our speculation. Now,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1319"></td>
        <td id="LC1319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you would call it a guess, no doubt, but I am almost certain that this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1320"></td>
        <td id="LC1320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">address has been written in a hotel.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1321"></td>
        <td id="LC1321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1322"></td>
        <td id="LC1322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How in the world can you say that?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1323"></td>
        <td id="LC1323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1324"></td>
        <td id="LC1324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If you examine it carefully you will see that both the pen and the ink</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1325"></td>
        <td id="LC1325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have given the writer trouble. The pen has spluttered twice in a single</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1326"></td>
        <td id="LC1326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word and has run dry three times in a short address, showing that there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1327"></td>
        <td id="LC1327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was very little ink in the bottle. Now, a private pen or ink-bottle is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1328"></td>
        <td id="LC1328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seldom allowed to be in such a state, and the combination of the two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1329"></td>
        <td id="LC1329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must be quite rare. But you know the hotel ink and the hotel pen, where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1330"></td>
        <td id="LC1330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is rare to get anything else. Yes, I have very little hesitation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1331"></td>
        <td id="LC1331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in saying that could we examine the waste-paper baskets of the hotels</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1332"></td>
        <td id="LC1332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">around Charing Cross until we found the remains of the mutilated Times</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1333"></td>
        <td id="LC1333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leader we could lay our hands straight upon the person who sent this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1334"></td>
        <td id="LC1334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">singular message. Halloa! Halloa! What’s this?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1335"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1424"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1426"></td>
        <td id="LC1426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1427"></td>
        <td id="LC1427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It seems to show that someone knows more than we do about what goes on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1428"></td>
        <td id="LC1428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the moor,” said Dr. Mortimer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1429"></td>
        <td id="LC1429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1430"></td>
        <td id="LC1430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And also,” said Holmes, “that someone is not ill-disposed towards you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1431"></td>
        <td id="LC1431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since they warn you of danger.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1432"></td>
        <td id="LC1432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1433"></td>
        <td id="LC1433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Or it may be that they wish, for their own purposes, to scare me away.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1434"></td>
        <td id="LC1434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1435"></td>
        <td id="LC1435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, of course, that is possible also. I am very much indebted to you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1436"></td>
        <td id="LC1436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dr. Mortimer, for introducing me to a problem which presents several</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1437"></td>
        <td id="LC1437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interesting alternatives. But the practical point which we now have to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1438"></td>
        <td id="LC1438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">decide, Sir Henry, is whether it is or is not advisable for you to go to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1439"></td>
        <td id="LC1439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Baskerville Hall.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1440"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1441"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1443"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">human beings?”</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1449"></td>
        <td id="LC1449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1450"></td>
        <td id="LC1450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Whichever it is, my answer is fixed. There is no devil in hell, Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1451"></td>
        <td id="LC1451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes, and there is no man upon earth who can prevent me from going to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1452"></td>
        <td id="LC1452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the home of my own people, and you may take that to be my final answer.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1453"></td>
        <td id="LC1453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> His dark brows knitted and his face flushed to a dusky red as he spoke.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1454"></td>
        <td id="LC1454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was evident that the fiery temper of the Baskervilles was not extinct</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1455"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1456"></td>

        <td id="L1459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1459"></td>
        <td id="LC1459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes, it’s half-past eleven now and I am going back right away to my</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1460"></td>
        <td id="LC1460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hotel. Suppose you and your friend, Dr. Watson, come round and lunch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1461"></td>
        <td id="LC1461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with us at two. I’ll be able to tell you more clearly then how this</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1462"></td>
        <td id="LC1462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing strikes me.”</td>

        <td id="L1463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1463"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1464"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L1476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1476"></td>
        <td id="LC1476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We heard the steps of our visitors descend the stair and the bang of the</td>

        <td id="L1477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1477"></td>
        <td id="LC1477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">front door. In an instant Holmes had changed from the languid dreamer to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1478"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">street. Dr. Mortimer and Baskerville were still visible about two</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1485"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1486"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1487"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">following the direction of his eager eyes, I saw that a hansom cab with</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1501"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1502"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1505"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1514"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1518"></td>
        <td id="LC1518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Who was the man?”</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1519"></td>
        <td id="LC1519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1520"></td>
        <td id="LC1520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have not an idea.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1521"></td>
        <td id="LC1521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1522"></td>
        <td id="LC1522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“A spy?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1523"></td>
        <td id="LC1523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1524"></td>
        <td id="LC1524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, it was evident from what we have heard that Baskerville has been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1525"></td>
        <td id="LC1525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very closely shadowed by someone since he has been in town. How else</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1526"></td>
        <td id="LC1526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could it be known so quickly that it was the Northumberland Hotel which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1527"></td>
        <td id="LC1527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he had chosen? If they had followed him the first day I argued that they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1528"></td>
        <td id="LC1528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would follow him also the second. You may have observed that I twice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1529"></td>
        <td id="LC1529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strolled over to the window while Dr. Mortimer was reading his legend.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1530"></td>
        <td id="LC1530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1531"></td>
        <td id="LC1531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, I remember.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1532"></td>
        <td id="LC1532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1533"></td>
        <td id="LC1533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I was looking out for loiterers in the street, but I saw none. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1534"></td>
        <td id="LC1534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are dealing with a clever man, Watson. This matter cuts very deep, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1535"></td>
        <td id="LC1535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though I have not finally made up my mind whether it is a benevolent or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1536"></td>
        <td id="LC1536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a malevolent agency which is in touch with us, I am conscious always of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1537"></td>
        <td id="LC1537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power and design. When our friends left I at once followed them in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1538"></td>
        <td id="LC1538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hopes of marking down their invisible attendant. So wily was he that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1539"></td>
        <td id="LC1539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had not trusted himself upon foot, but he had availed himself of a cab</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1540"></td>
        <td id="LC1540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so that he could loiter behind or dash past them and so escape their</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1541"></td>
        <td id="LC1541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">notice. His method had the additional advantage that if they were to</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disadvantage.”</td>

        <td id="L1544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1544"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1619"></td>
        <td id="LC1619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You will tell him that you want to see the waste-paper of yesterday.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1620"></td>
        <td id="LC1620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You will say that an important telegram has miscarried and that you are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1621"></td>
        <td id="LC1621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking for it. You understand?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1622"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1623"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1624"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1625"></td>
        <td id="LC1625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But what you are really looking for is the centre page of the Times</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1626"></td>
        <td id="LC1626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with some holes cut in it with scissors. Here is a copy of the Times. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1627"></td>
        <td id="LC1627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is this page. You could easily recognize it, could you not?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1628"></td>
        <td id="LC1628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1629"></td>
        <td id="LC1629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, sir.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1630"></td>
        <td id="LC1630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1631"></td>
        <td id="LC1631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“In each case the outside porter will send for the hall porter, to whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1632"></td>
        <td id="LC1632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also you will give a shilling. Here are twenty-three shillings. You will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1633"></td>
        <td id="LC1633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then learn in possibly twenty cases out of the twenty-three that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1634"></td>
        <td id="LC1634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waste of the day before has been burned or removed. In the three other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1635"></td>
        <td id="LC1635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cases you will be shown a heap of paper and you will look for this page</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1636"></td>
        <td id="LC1636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Times among it. The odds are enormously against your finding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1637"></td>
        <td id="LC1637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. There are ten shillings over in case of emergencies. Let me have a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1638"></td>
        <td id="LC1638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">report by wire at Baker Street before evening. And now, Watson, it only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1639"></td>
        <td id="LC1639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remains for us to find out by wire the identity of the cabman, No. 2704,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1640"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1648"></td>
        <td id="LC1648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sherlock Holmes had, in a very remarkable degree, the power of detaching</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1649"></td>
        <td id="LC1649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his mind at will. For two hours the strange business in which we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1650"></td>
        <td id="LC1650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been involved appeared to be forgotten, and he was entirely absorbed in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1651"></td>
        <td id="LC1651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the pictures of the modern Belgian masters. He would talk of nothing</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC1652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but art, of which he had the crudest ideas, from our leaving the gallery</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1653"></td>
        <td id="LC1653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">until we found ourselves at the Northumberland Hotel.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1654"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1655"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1656"></td>
        <td id="LC1656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asked me to show you up at once when you came.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC1663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One was Theophilus Johnson and family, of Newcastle; the other Mrs.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1664"></td>
        <td id="LC1664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Oldmore and maid, of High Lodge, Alton.</td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1666"></td>
        <td id="LC1666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Surely that must be the same Johnson whom I used to know,” said Holmes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1667"></td>
        <td id="LC1667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the porter. “A lawyer, is he not, gray-headed, and walks with a</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC1670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, sir, this is Mr. Johnson, the coal-owner, a very active gentleman,</td>

        <td id="L1671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1671"></td>

      <tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC1678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ah, that settles it. Mrs. Oldmore, too; I seem to remember the name.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1679"></td>
        <td id="LC1679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Excuse my curiosity, but often in calling upon one friend one finds</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC1680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another.”</td>

        <td id="L1681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1681"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1682"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1683"></td>
        <td id="LC1683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She always comes to us when she is in town.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1684"></td>
        <td id="LC1684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1685"></td>
        <td id="LC1685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Thank you; I am afraid I cannot claim her acquaintance. We have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1686"></td>
        <td id="LC1686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">established a most important fact by these questions, Watson,” he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1687"></td>
        <td id="LC1687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continued in a low voice as we went upstairs together. “We know now that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1688"></td>
        <td id="LC1688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the people who are so interested in our friend have not settled down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1689"></td>
        <td id="LC1689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his own hotel. That means that while they are, as we have seen, very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1690"></td>
        <td id="LC1690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anxious to watch him, they are equally anxious that he should not see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1691"></td>
        <td id="LC1691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them. Now, this is a most suggestive fact.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1692"></td>
        <td id="LC1692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1693"></td>
        <td id="LC1693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What does it suggest?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1694"></td>
        <td id="LC1694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1695"></td>
        <td id="LC1695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It suggests--halloa, my dear fellow, what on earth is the matter?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1696"></td>
        <td id="LC1696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1697"></td>
        <td id="LC1697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As we came round the top of the stairs we had run up against Sir Henry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1698"></td>
        <td id="LC1698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Baskerville himself. His face was flushed with anger, and he held an old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1699"></td>
        <td id="LC1699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and dusty boot in one of his hands. So furious was he that he was hardly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1700"></td>
        <td id="LC1700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">articulate, and when he did speak it was in a much broader and more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1701"></td>
        <td id="LC1701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Western dialect than any which we had heard from him in the morning.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1702"></td>
        <td id="LC1702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1703"></td>
        <td id="LC1703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Seems to me they are playing me for a sucker in this hotel,” he cried.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1704"></td>
        <td id="LC1704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“They’ll find they’ve started in to monkey with the wrong man unless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1705"></td>
        <td id="LC1705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they are careful. By thunder, if that chap can’t find my missing boot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1706"></td>
        <td id="LC1706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there will be trouble. I can take a joke with the best, Mr. Holmes, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1707"></td>
        <td id="LC1707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they’ve got a bit over the mark this time.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1708"></td>
        <td id="LC1708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1709"></td>
        <td id="LC1709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Still looking for your boot?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1710"></td>
        <td id="LC1710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1711"></td>
        <td id="LC1711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, sir, and mean to find it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1712"></td>
        <td id="LC1712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1713"></td>
        <td id="LC1713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But, surely, you said that it was a new brown boot?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1714"></td>
        <td id="LC1714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1715"></td>
        <td id="LC1715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“So it was, sir. And now it’s an old black one.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1716"></td>
        <td id="LC1716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1717"></td>
        <td id="LC1717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What! you don’t mean to say--?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1718"></td>
        <td id="LC1718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1719"></td>
        <td id="LC1719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That’s just what I do mean to say. I only had three pairs in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1720"></td>
        <td id="LC1720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world--the new brown, the old black, and the patent leathers, which I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1721"></td>
        <td id="LC1721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wearing. Last night they took one of my brown ones, and today they have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1722"></td>
        <td id="LC1722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sneaked one of the black. Well, have you got it? Speak out, man, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1723"></td>
        <td id="LC1723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">don’t stand staring!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1724"></td>
        <td id="LC1724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1725"></td>
        <td id="LC1725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">An agitated German waiter had appeared upon the scene.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1726"></td>
        <td id="LC1726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1727"></td>
        <td id="LC1727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, sir; I have made inquiry all over the hotel, but I can hear no word</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1728"></td>
        <td id="LC1728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1729"></td>
        <td id="LC1729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1730"></td>
        <td id="LC1730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, either that boot comes back before sundown or I’ll see the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1731"></td>
        <td id="LC1731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manager and tell him that I go right straight out of this hotel.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1732"></td>
        <td id="LC1732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1733"></td>
        <td id="LC1733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It shall be found, sir--I promise you that if you will have a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1734"></td>
        <td id="LC1734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patience it will be found.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1735"></td>
        <td id="LC1735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1736"></td>
        <td id="LC1736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Mind it is, for it’s the last thing of mine that I’ll lose in this den</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1737"></td>
        <td id="LC1737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of thieves. Well, well, Mr. Holmes, you’ll excuse my troubling you about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1738"></td>
        <td id="LC1738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a trifle--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1739"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1740"></td>
        <td id="LC1740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I think it’s well worth troubling about.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1741"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1742"></td>
        <td id="LC1742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, you look very serious over it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1743"></td>
        <td id="LC1743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1744"></td>
        <td id="LC1744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How do you explain it?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1745"></td>
        <td id="LC1745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1746"></td>
        <td id="LC1746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I just don’t attempt to explain it. It seems the very maddest, queerest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1747"></td>
        <td id="LC1747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing that ever happened to me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1748"></td>
        <td id="LC1748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1749"></td>
        <td id="LC1749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The queerest perhaps--” said Holmes thoughtfully.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1750"></td>
        <td id="LC1750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1751"></td>
        <td id="LC1751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What do you make of it yourself?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1752"></td>
        <td id="LC1752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1753"></td>
        <td id="LC1753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, I don’t profess to understand it yet. This case of yours is very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1754"></td>
        <td id="LC1754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complex, Sir Henry. When taken in conjunction with your uncle’s death</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1755"></td>
        <td id="LC1755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am not sure that of all the five hundred cases of capital importance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1756"></td>
        <td id="LC1756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I have handled there is one which cuts so deep. But we hold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1757"></td>
        <td id="LC1757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several threads in our hands, and the odds are that one or other of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1758"></td>
        <td id="LC1758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guides us to the truth. We may waste time in following the wrong one,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1759"></td>
        <td id="LC1759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but sooner or later we must come upon the right.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1760"></td>
        <td id="LC1760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1761"></td>
        <td id="LC1761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We had a pleasant luncheon in which little was said of the business</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1762"></td>
        <td id="LC1762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which had brought us together. It was in the private sitting-room to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1763"></td>
        <td id="LC1763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which we afterwards repaired that Holmes asked Baskerville what were his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1764"></td>
        <td id="LC1764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intentions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1765"></td>
        <td id="LC1765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1766"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1767"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1768"></td>
        <td id="LC1768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And when?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1769"></td>
        <td id="LC1769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
