      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1771"></td>
        <td id="LC1771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1772"></td>
        <td id="LC1772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“On the whole,” said Holmes, “I think that your decision is a wise one.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1773"></td>
        <td id="LC1773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have ample evidence that you are being dogged in London, and amid the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1774"></td>
        <td id="LC1774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">millions of this great city it is difficult to discover who these people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1775"></td>
        <td id="LC1775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are or what their object can be. If their intentions are evil they might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1776"></td>
        <td id="LC1776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do you a mischief, and we should be powerless to prevent it. You did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1777"></td>
        <td id="LC1777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know, Dr. Mortimer, that you were followed this morning from my house?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1778"></td>
        <td id="LC1778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1779"></td>
        <td id="LC1779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dr. Mortimer started violently. “Followed! By whom?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1780"></td>
        <td id="LC1780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1781"></td>
        <td id="LC1781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That, unfortunately, is what I cannot tell you. Have you among your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1782"></td>
        <td id="LC1782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neighbours or acquaintances on Dartmoor any man with a black, full</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1783"></td>
        <td id="LC1783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beard?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1784"></td>
        <td id="LC1784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1785"></td>
        <td id="LC1785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No--or, let me see--why, yes. Barrymore, Sir Charles’s butler, is a man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1786"></td>
        <td id="LC1786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a full, black beard.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1787"></td>
        <td id="LC1787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1788"></td>
        <td id="LC1788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ha! Where is Barrymore?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1789"></td>
        <td id="LC1789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1790"></td>
        <td id="LC1790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He is in charge of the Hall.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1791"></td>
        <td id="LC1791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1792"></td>
        <td id="LC1792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We had best ascertain if he is really there, or if by any possibility</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1793"></td>
        <td id="LC1793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he might be in London.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1794"></td>
        <td id="LC1794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1795"></td>
        <td id="LC1795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How can you do that?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1796"></td>
        <td id="LC1796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1797"></td>
        <td id="LC1797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Give me a telegraph form. ‘Is all ready for Sir Henry?’ That will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1798"></td>
        <td id="LC1798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do. Address to Mr. Barrymore, Baskerville Hall. What is the nearest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1799"></td>
        <td id="LC1799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">telegraph-office? Grimpen. Very good, we will send a second wire to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1800"></td>
        <td id="LC1800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">postmaster, Grimpen: ‘Telegram to Mr. Barrymore to be delivered into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1801"></td>
        <td id="LC1801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his own hand. If absent, please return wire to Sir Henry Baskerville,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1802"></td>
        <td id="LC1802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Northumberland Hotel.’ That should let us know before evening whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1803"></td>
        <td id="LC1803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Barrymore is at his post in Devonshire or not.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1804"></td>
        <td id="LC1804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1805"></td>
        <td id="LC1805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That’s so,” said Baskerville. “By the way, Dr. Mortimer, who is this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1806"></td>
        <td id="LC1806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Barrymore, anyhow?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1807"></td>
        <td id="LC1807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1808"></td>
        <td id="LC1808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He is the son of the old caretaker, who is dead. They have looked after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1809"></td>
        <td id="LC1809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Hall for four generations now. So far as I know, he and his wife are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1810"></td>
        <td id="LC1810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as respectable a couple as any in the county.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1811"></td>
        <td id="LC1811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1812"></td>
        <td id="LC1812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“At the same time,” said Baskerville, “it’s clear enough that so long as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1813"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1884"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1887"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC1889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">help you. No, Sir Henry, you must take with you someone, a trusty man,</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1891"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1893"></td>
        <td id="LC1893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1894"></td>
        <td id="LC1894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If matters came to a crisis I should endeavour to be present in person;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1895"></td>
        <td id="LC1895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but you can understand that, with my extensive consulting practice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1896"></td>
        <td id="LC1896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and with the constant appeals which reach me from many quarters, it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1897"></td>
        <td id="LC1897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impossible for me to be absent from London for an indefinite time. At</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1898"></td>
        <td id="LC1898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the present instant one of the most revered names in England is being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1899"></td>
        <td id="LC1899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">besmirched by a blackmailer, and only I can stop a disastrous scandal.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1900"></td>
        <td id="LC1900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You will see how impossible it is for me to go to Dartmoor.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1901"></td>
        <td id="LC1901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1902"></td>
        <td id="LC1902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Whom would you recommend, then?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1903"></td>
        <td id="LC1903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1904"></td>
        <td id="LC1904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes laid his hand upon my arm. “If my friend would undertake it there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1905"></td>
        <td id="LC1905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is no man who is better worth having at your side when you are in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1906"></td>
        <td id="LC1906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tight place. No one can say so more confidently than I.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1907"></td>
        <td id="LC1907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1908"></td>
        <td id="LC1908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The proposition took me completely by surprise, but before I had time to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1909"></td>
        <td id="LC1909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer, Baskerville seized me by the hand and wrung it heartily.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1910"></td>
        <td id="LC1910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1911"></td>
        <td id="LC1911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, now, that is real kind of you, Dr. Watson,” said he. “You see how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1912"></td>
        <td id="LC1912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is with me, and you know just as much about the matter as I do. If</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1913"></td>
        <td id="LC1913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you will come down to Baskerville Hall and see me through I’ll never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1914"></td>
        <td id="LC1914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forget it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1915"></td>
        <td id="LC1915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1916"></td>
        <td id="LC1916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The promise of adventure had always a fascination for me, and I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1917"></td>
        <td id="LC1917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complimented by the words of Holmes and by the eagerness with which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1918"></td>
        <td id="LC1918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">baronet hailed me as a companion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1919"></td>
        <td id="LC1919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1920"></td>
        <td id="LC1920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I will come, with pleasure,” said I. “I do not know how I could employ</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1921"></td>
        <td id="LC1921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my time better.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1922"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1923"></td>
        <td id="LC1923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And you will report very carefully to me,” said Holmes. “When a crisis</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1924"></td>
        <td id="LC1924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comes, as it will do, I will direct how you shall act. I suppose that by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1925"></td>
        <td id="LC1925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Saturday all might be ready?”</td>

        <td id="L1926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1926"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC1934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We had risen to depart when Baskerville gave a cry, of triumph, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1935"></td>

        <td id="LC1936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under a cabinet.</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L1940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1940"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1941"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1942"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1943"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1949"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1951"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1952"></td>
        <td id="LC1952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The German was sent for but professed to know nothing of the matter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1953"></td>
        <td id="LC1953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nor could any inquiry clear it up. Another item had been added to that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1954"></td>
        <td id="LC1954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constant and apparently purposeless series of small mysteries which had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1955"></td>
        <td id="LC1955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">succeeded each other so rapidly. Setting aside the whole grim story of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1956"></td>
        <td id="LC1956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sir Charles’s death, we had a line of inexplicable incidents all within</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1957"></td>
        <td id="LC1957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the limits of two days, which included the receipt of the printed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1958"></td>
        <td id="LC1958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter, the black-bearded spy in the hansom, the loss of the new brown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1959"></td>
        <td id="LC1959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boot, the loss of the old black boot, and now the return of the new</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1960"></td>
        <td id="LC1960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brown boot. Holmes sat in silence in the cab as we drove back to Baker</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1961"></td>
        <td id="LC1961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Street, and I knew from his drawn brows and keen face that his mind,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1962"></td>
        <td id="LC1962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like my own, was busy in endeavouring to frame some scheme into which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1963"></td>
        <td id="LC1963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all these strange and apparently disconnected episodes could be fitted.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1964"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1967"></td>
        <td id="LC1967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just before dinner two telegrams were handed in. The first ran:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1968"></td>

        <td id="L1969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1969"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1970"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1973"></td>
        <td id="LC1973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Visited twenty-three hotels as directed, but sorry, to report unable to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1974"></td>
        <td id="LC1974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trace cut sheet of Times. CARTWRIGHT.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1975"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1976"></td>
        <td id="LC1976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There go two of my threads, Watson. There is nothing more stimulating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1977"></td>
        <td id="LC1977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than a case where everything goes against you. We must cast round for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1979"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1980"></td>
        <td id="LC1980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We have still the cabman who drove the spy.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1981"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1982"></td>
        <td id="LC1982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Exactly. I have wired to get his name and address from the Official</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1983"></td>
        <td id="LC1983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Registry. I should not be surprised if this were an answer to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC1984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">question.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1985"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1986"></td>
        <td id="LC1986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The ring at the bell proved to be something even more satisfactory</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC1988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered who was evidently the man himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1989"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1990"></td>
        <td id="LC1990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I got a message from the head office that a gent at this address had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1991"></td>
        <td id="LC1991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been inquiring for No. 2704,” said he. “I’ve driven my cab this seven</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1992"></td>
        <td id="LC1992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years and never a word of complaint. I came here straight from the Yard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1993"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1996"></td>
        <td id="LC1996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“On the contrary, I have half a sovereign for you if you will give me a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1997"></td>
        <td id="LC1997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clear answer to my questions.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1998"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1999"></td>
        <td id="LC1999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, I’ve had a good day and no mistake,” said the cabman with a grin.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2000"></td>
        <td id="LC2000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What was it you wanted to ask, sir?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2001"></td>
        <td id="LC2001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2002"></td>
        <td id="LC2002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“First of all your name and address, in case I want you again.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2003"></td>
        <td id="LC2003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2004"></td>
        <td id="LC2004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“John Clayton, 3 Turpey Street, the Borough. My cab is out of Shipley’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2005"></td>
        <td id="LC2005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yard, near Waterloo Station.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2006"></td>
        <td id="LC2006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2007"></td>
        <td id="LC2007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sherlock Holmes made a note of it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2008"></td>
        <td id="LC2008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2009"></td>
        <td id="LC2009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now, Clayton, tell me all about the fare who came and watched this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2010"></td>
        <td id="LC2010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house at ten o’clock this morning and afterwards followed the two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2011"></td>
        <td id="LC2011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentlemen down Regent Street.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2012"></td>
        <td id="LC2012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2013"></td>
        <td id="LC2013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The man looked surprised and a little embarrassed. “Why, there’s no good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2014"></td>
        <td id="LC2014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my telling you things, for you seem to know as much as I do already,”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2015"></td>
        <td id="LC2015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> said he. “The truth is that the gentleman told me that he was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2016"></td>
        <td id="LC2016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">detective and that I was to say nothing about him to anyone.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2017"></td>
        <td id="LC2017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2018"></td>
        <td id="LC2018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My good fellow; this is a very serious business, and you may find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2019"></td>
        <td id="LC2019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yourself in a pretty bad position if you try to hide anything from me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2020"></td>
        <td id="LC2020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You say that your fare told you that he was a detective?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2021"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L2025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2025"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L2031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2031"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2032"></td>
        <td id="LC2032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes cast a swift glance of triumph at me. “Oh, he mentioned his name,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2033"></td>
        <td id="LC2033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did he? That was imprudent. What was the name that he mentioned?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2034"></td>
        <td id="LC2034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2035"></td>
        <td id="LC2035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“His name,” said the cabman, “was Mr. Sherlock Holmes.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2036"></td>
        <td id="LC2036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2037"></td>
        <td id="LC2037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Never have I seen my friend more completely taken aback than by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2038"></td>
        <td id="LC2038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cabman’s reply. For an instant he sat in silent amazement. Then he burst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2039"></td>
        <td id="LC2039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into a hearty laugh.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2040"></td>
        <td id="LC2040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2041"></td>
        <td id="LC2041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“A touch, Watson--an undeniable touch!” said he. “I feel a foil as quick</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2042"></td>
        <td id="LC2042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and supple as my own. He got home upon me very prettily that time. So</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2043"></td>
        <td id="LC2043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his name was Sherlock Holmes, was it?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2044"></td>
        <td id="LC2044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2045"></td>
        <td id="LC2045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, sir, that was the gentleman’s name.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2046"></td>
        <td id="LC2046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2047"></td>
        <td id="LC2047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Excellent! Tell me where you picked him up and all that occurred.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2048"></td>
        <td id="LC2048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2049"></td>
        <td id="LC2049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He hailed me at half-past nine in Trafalgar Square. He said that he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2050"></td>
        <td id="LC2050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a detective, and he offered me two guineas if I would do exactly what he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2051"></td>
        <td id="LC2051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanted all day and ask no questions. I was glad enough to agree. First</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2052"></td>
        <td id="LC2052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we drove down to the Northumberland Hotel and waited there until two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2053"></td>
        <td id="LC2053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentlemen came out and took a cab from the rank. We followed their cab</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2054"></td>
        <td id="LC2054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">until it pulled up somewhere near here.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2055"></td>
        <td id="LC2055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2056"></td>
        <td id="LC2056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“This very door,” said Holmes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2057"></td>
        <td id="LC2057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2058"></td>
        <td id="LC2058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, I couldn’t be sure of that, but I dare say my fare knew all about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2059"></td>
        <td id="LC2059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. We pulled up halfway down the street and waited an hour and a half.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2060"></td>
        <td id="LC2060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the two gentlemen passed us, walking, and we followed down Baker</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2061"></td>
        <td id="LC2061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Street and along--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2062"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2063"></td>
        <td id="LC2063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I know,” said Holmes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2064"></td>
        <td id="LC2064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2065"></td>
        <td id="LC2065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Until we got three-quarters down Regent Street. Then my gentleman threw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2066"></td>
        <td id="LC2066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up the trap, and he cried that I should drive right away to Waterloo</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2067"></td>
        <td id="LC2067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Station as hard as I could go. I whipped up the mare and we were there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2068"></td>
        <td id="LC2068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under the ten minutes. Then he paid up his two guineas, like a good one,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2069"></td>
        <td id="LC2069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and away he went into the station. Only just as he was leaving he turned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2070"></td>
        <td id="LC2070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round and he said: ‘It might interest you to know that you have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2071"></td>
        <td id="LC2071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">driving Mr. Sherlock Holmes.’ That’s how I come to know the name.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2072"></td>
        <td id="LC2072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2073"></td>
        <td id="LC2073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I see. And you saw no more of him?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2074"></td>
        <td id="LC2074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2075"></td>
        <td id="LC2075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not after he went into the station.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2076"></td>
        <td id="LC2076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2077"></td>
        <td id="LC2077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And how would you describe Mr. Sherlock Holmes?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2078"></td>
        <td id="LC2078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2079"></td>
        <td id="LC2079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The cabman scratched his head. “Well, he wasn’t altogether such an easy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2080"></td>
        <td id="LC2080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentleman to describe. I’d put him at forty years of age, and he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2081"></td>
        <td id="LC2081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a middle height, two or three inches shorter than you, sir. He was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2082"></td>
        <td id="LC2082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dressed like a toff, and he had a black beard, cut square at the end,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2083"></td>
        <td id="LC2083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a pale face. I don’t know as I could say more than that.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2084"></td>
        <td id="LC2084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2085"></td>
        <td id="LC2085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Colour of his eyes?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2086"></td>
        <td id="LC2086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2087"></td>
        <td id="LC2087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, I can’t say that.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2088"></td>
        <td id="LC2088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2089"></td>
        <td id="LC2089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Nothing more that you can remember?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2090"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2091"></td>
        <td id="LC2091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, sir; nothing.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2092"></td>
        <td id="LC2092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2093"></td>
        <td id="LC2093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, then, here is your half-sovereign. There’s another one waiting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2094"></td>
        <td id="LC2094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for you if you can bring any more information. Good-night!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2095"></td>
        <td id="LC2095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2096"></td>
        <td id="LC2096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Good-night, sir, and thank you!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2097"></td>
        <td id="LC2097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2098"></td>
        <td id="LC2098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">John Clayton departed chuckling, and Holmes turned to me with a shrug of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2099"></td>
        <td id="LC2099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his shoulders and a rueful smile.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2100"></td>
        <td id="LC2100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2101"></td>
        <td id="LC2101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Snap goes our third thread, and we end where we began,” said he. “The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2102"></td>
        <td id="LC2102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cunning rascal! He knew our number, knew that Sir Henry Baskerville had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2103"></td>
        <td id="LC2103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consulted me, spotted who I was in Regent Street, conjectured that I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2104"></td>
        <td id="LC2104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got the number of the cab and would lay my hands on the driver, and so</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2105"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2106"></td>
        <td id="LC2106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got a foeman who is worthy of our steel. I’ve been checkmated in London.</td>

      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2199"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2281"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2282"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2283"></td>
        <td id="LC2283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A steep curve of heath-clad land, an outlying spur of the moor, lay in</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2285"></td>
        <td id="LC2285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon its pedestal, was a mounted soldier, dark and stern, his rifle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2287"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2288"></td>
        <td id="LC2288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2289"></td>
        <td id="LC2289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What is this, Perkins?” asked Dr. Mortimer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2290"></td>
        <td id="LC2290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2291"></td>
        <td id="LC2291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Our driver half turned in his seat. “There’s a convict escaped from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2292"></td>
        <td id="LC2292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Princetown, sir. He’s been out three days now, and the warders watch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2293"></td>

        <td id="L2294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2294"></td>
        <td id="LC2294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">farmers about here don’t like it, sir, and that’s a fact.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2295"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2296"></td>

        <td id="LC2297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">information.”</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2360"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2373"></td>
        <td id="LC2373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A tall man had stepped from the shadow of the porch to open the door of</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2374"></td>

        <td id="LC2376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bags.</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2378"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2379"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2380"></td>
        <td id="LC2380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2381"></td>
        <td id="LC2381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Surely you will stay and have some dinner?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2382"></td>
        <td id="LC2382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2383"></td>
        <td id="LC2383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, I must go. I shall probably find some work awaiting me. I would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2384"></td>
        <td id="LC2384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stay to show you over the house, but Barrymore will be a better guide</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2385"></td>
        <td id="LC2385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than I. Good-bye, and never hesitate night or day to send for me if I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2386"></td>
        <td id="LC2386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can be of service.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2387"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2388"></td>
        <td id="LC2388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wheels died away down the drive while Sir Henry and I turned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2389"></td>
        <td id="LC2389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the hall, and the door clanged heavily behind us. It was a fine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2390"></td>
        <td id="LC2390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apartment in which we found ourselves, large, lofty, and heavily</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2472"></td>
        <td id="LC2472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My word, it isn’t a very cheerful place,” said Sir Henry. “I suppose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2473"></td>
        <td id="LC2473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one can tone down to it, but I feel a bit out of the picture at present.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2474"></td>
        <td id="LC2474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I don’t wonder that my uncle got a little jumpy if he lived all alone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2475"></td>
        <td id="LC2475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in such a house as this. However, if it suits you, we will retire early</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2476"></td>
        <td id="LC2476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tonight, and perhaps things may seem more cheerful in the morning.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2477"></td>
        <td id="LC2477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2478"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2571"></td>
        <td id="LC2571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2572"></td>
        <td id="LC2572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, father, I delivered it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2573"></td>
        <td id="LC2573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2574"></td>
        <td id="LC2574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Into his own hands?” I asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2575"></td>
        <td id="LC2575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2576"></td>
        <td id="LC2576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, he was up in the loft at the time, so that I could not put it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2577"></td>
        <td id="LC2577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into his own hands, but I gave it into Mrs. Barrymore’s hands, and she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2578"></td>
        <td id="LC2578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">promised to deliver it at once.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2579"></td>
        <td id="LC2579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2580"></td>
        <td id="LC2580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Did you see Mr. Barrymore?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2581"></td>
        <td id="LC2581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2582"></td>
        <td id="LC2582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, sir; I tell you he was in the loft.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2583"></td>
        <td id="LC2583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2584"></td>
        <td id="LC2584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If you didn’t see him, how do you know he was in the loft?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2585"></td>
        <td id="LC2585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2586"></td>
        <td id="LC2586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, surely his own wife ought to know where he is,” said the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2587"></td>
        <td id="LC2587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">postmaster testily. “Didn’t he get the telegram? If there is any mistake</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2588"></td>
        <td id="LC2588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is for Mr. Barrymore himself to complain.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2589"></td>
        <td id="LC2589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2590"></td>
        <td id="LC2590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It seemed hopeless to pursue the inquiry any farther, but it was clear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2591"></td>
        <td id="LC2591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that in spite of Holmes’s ruse we had no proof that Barrymore had not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2592"></td>
        <td id="LC2592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been in London all the time. Suppose that it were so--suppose that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2593"></td>
        <td id="LC2593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same man had been the last who had seen Sir Charles alive, and the first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2594"></td>
        <td id="LC2594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to dog the new heir when he returned to England. What then? Was he the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2595"></td>
        <td id="LC2595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agent of others or had he some sinister design of his own? What interest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2596"></td>
        <td id="LC2596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could he have in persecuting the Baskerville family? I thought of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2597"></td>
        <td id="LC2597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strange warning clipped out of the leading article of the Times. Was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2598"></td>
        <td id="LC2598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that his work or was it possibly the doing of someone who was bent upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2599"></td>
        <td id="LC2599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">counteracting his schemes? The only conceivable motive was that which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2600"></td>
        <td id="LC2600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been suggested by Sir Henry, that if the family could be scared away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2601"></td>
        <td id="LC2601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a comfortable and permanent home would be secured for the Barrymores.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2602"></td>
        <td id="LC2602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But surely such an explanation as that would be quite inadequate to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2603"></td>
        <td id="LC2603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">account for the deep and subtle scheming which seemed to be weaving an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2604"></td>
        <td id="LC2604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invisible net round the young baronet. Holmes himself had said that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2605"></td>
        <td id="LC2605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no more complex case had come to him in all the long series of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2606"></td>
        <td id="LC2606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sensational investigations. I prayed, as I walked back along the gray,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2607"></td>
        <td id="LC2607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lonely road, that my friend might soon be freed from his preoccupations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2608"></td>
        <td id="LC2608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and able to come down to take this heavy burden of responsibility from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2609"></td>
        <td id="LC2609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my shoulders.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2610"></td>
        <td id="LC2610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2611"></td>
        <td id="LC2611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suddenly my thoughts were interrupted by the sound of running feet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2612"></td>
        <td id="LC2612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind me and by a voice which called me by name. I turned, expecting to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2613"></td>
        <td id="LC2613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see Dr. Mortimer, but to my surprise it was a stranger who was pursuing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2614"></td>
        <td id="LC2614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. He was a small, slim, clean-shaven, prim-faced man, flaxen-haired</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2615"></td>
        <td id="LC2615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and leanjawed, between thirty and forty years of age, dressed in a gray</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2616"></td>
        <td id="LC2616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suit and wearing a straw hat. A tin box for botanical specimens hung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2617"></td>
        <td id="LC2617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over his shoulder and he carried a green butterfly-net in one of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2618"></td>
        <td id="LC2618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2619"></td>
        <td id="LC2619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2620"></td>
        <td id="LC2620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You will, I am sure, excuse my presumption, Dr. Watson,” said he as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2621"></td>
        <td id="LC2621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came panting up to where I stood. “Here on the moor we are homely folk</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2622"></td>
        <td id="LC2622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and do not wait for formal introductions. You may possibly have heard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2623"></td>
        <td id="LC2623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my name from our mutual friend, Mortimer. I am Stapleton, of Merripit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2624"></td>
        <td id="LC2624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">House.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2625"></td>
        <td id="LC2625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2626"></td>
        <td id="LC2626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Your net and box would have told me as much,” said I, “for I knew that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2627"></td>
        <td id="LC2627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Stapleton was a naturalist. But how did you know me?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2628"></td>
        <td id="LC2628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2629"></td>
        <td id="LC2629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have been calling on Mortimer, and he pointed you out to me from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2630"></td>
        <td id="LC2630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the window of his surgery as you passed. As our road lay the same way I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2631"></td>
        <td id="LC2631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought that I would overtake you and introduce myself. I trust that Sir</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2632"></td>
        <td id="LC2632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Henry is none the worse for his journey?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2633"></td>
        <td id="LC2633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2634"></td>
        <td id="LC2634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He is very well, thank you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2635"></td>
        <td id="LC2635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2636"></td>
        <td id="LC2636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We were all rather afraid that after the sad death of Sir Charles the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2637"></td>
        <td id="LC2637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">new baronet might refuse to live here. It is asking much of a wealthy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2638"></td>
        <td id="LC2638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man to come down and bury himself in a place of this kind, but I need</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2639"></td>
        <td id="LC2639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not tell you that it means a very great deal to the countryside. Sir</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2640"></td>
        <td id="LC2640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Henry has, I suppose, no superstitious fears in the matter?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2641"></td>
        <td id="LC2641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2642"></td>
        <td id="LC2642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I do not think that it is likely.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2643"></td>
        <td id="LC2643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2644"></td>
        <td id="LC2644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Of course you know the legend of the fiend dog which haunts the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2645"></td>
        <td id="LC2645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">family?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2646"></td>
        <td id="LC2646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2647"></td>
        <td id="LC2647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have heard it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2648"></td>
        <td id="LC2648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2649"></td>
        <td id="LC2649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is extraordinary how credulous the peasants are about here! Any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2650"></td>
        <td id="LC2650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">number of them are ready to swear that they have seen such a creature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2651"></td>
        <td id="LC2651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the moor.” He spoke with a smile, but I seemed to read in his eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2652"></td>
        <td id="LC2652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he took the matter more seriously. “The story took a great hold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2653"></td>
        <td id="LC2653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the imagination of Sir Charles, and I have no doubt that it led to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2654"></td>
        <td id="LC2654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his tragic end.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2655"></td>
        <td id="LC2655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2656"></td>
        <td id="LC2656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But how?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2657"></td>
        <td id="LC2657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2658"></td>
        <td id="LC2658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“His nerves were so worked up that the appearance of any dog might have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2659"></td>
        <td id="LC2659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had a fatal effect upon his diseased heart. I fancy that he really</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2660"></td>
        <td id="LC2660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did see something of the kind upon that last night in the yew alley. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2661"></td>
        <td id="LC2661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feared that some disaster might occur, for I was very fond of the old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2662"></td>
        <td id="LC2662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man, and I knew that his heart was weak.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2663"></td>
        <td id="LC2663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2664"></td>
        <td id="LC2664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How did you know that?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2665"></td>
        <td id="LC2665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2666"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2677"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2753"></td>
        <td id="LC2753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Stapleton laughed. “That is the great Grimpen Mire,” said he. “A false</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2754"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2755"></td>
