      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2756"></td>
        <td id="LC2756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a long time craning out of the bog-hole, but it sucked him down at last.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2757"></td>
        <td id="LC2757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Even in dry seasons it is a danger to cross it, but after these autumn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2758"></td>
        <td id="LC2758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rains it is an awful place. And yet I can find my way to the very heart</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2759"></td>
        <td id="LC2759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it and return alive. By George, there is another of those miserable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2760"></td>
        <td id="LC2760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ponies!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2761"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2762"></td>
        <td id="LC2762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Something brown was rolling and tossing among the green sedges. Then a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2763"></td>
        <td id="LC2763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long, agonized, writhing neck shot upward and a dreadful cry echoed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2764"></td>
        <td id="LC2764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over the moor. It turned me cold with horror, but my companion’s nerves</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2794"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2852"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2853"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2855"></td>
        <td id="LC2855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2856"></td>
        <td id="LC2856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A small fly or moth had fluttered across our path, and in an instant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2857"></td>
        <td id="LC2857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Stapleton was rushing with extraordinary energy and speed in pursuit of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2858"></td>
        <td id="LC2858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. To my dismay the creature flew straight for the great mire, and my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2859"></td>
        <td id="LC2859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquaintance never paused for an instant, bounding from tuft to tuft</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2860"></td>
        <td id="LC2860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind it, his green net waving in the air. His gray clothes and jerky,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2861"></td>
        <td id="LC2861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">zigzag, irregular progress made him not unlike some huge moth himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2862"></td>
        <td id="LC2862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was standing watching his pursuit with a mixture of admiration for his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2863"></td>
        <td id="LC2863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extraordinary activity and fear lest he should lose his footing in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2864"></td>
        <td id="LC2864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treacherous mire, when I heard the sound of steps and, turning round,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2865"></td>
        <td id="LC2865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found a woman near me upon the path. She had come from the direction in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2866"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2868"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2869"></td>
        <td id="LC2869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could not doubt that this was the Miss Stapleton of whom I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2870"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2871"></td>
        <td id="LC2871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remembered that I had heard someone describe her as being a beauty. The</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2872"></td>
        <td id="LC2872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woman who approached me was certainly that, and of a most uncommon type.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2873"></td>
        <td id="LC2873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There could not have been a greater contrast between brother and sister,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2874"></td>

        <td id="L2876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2876"></td>

      <tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2937"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2940"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2941"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2942"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2943"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2944"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2945"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2946"></td>
        <td id="LC2946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the house. Inside, however, there were large rooms furnished with an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2947"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2948"></td>
        <td id="LC2948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked from their windows at the interminable granite-flecked moor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2949"></td>
        <td id="LC2949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rolling unbroken to the farthest horizon I could not but marvel at what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2950"></td>
        <td id="LC2950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could have brought this highly educated man and this beautiful woman to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2951"></td>

</td>

      <tr>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3043"></td>
        <td id="LC3043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3044"></td>
        <td id="LC3044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But what is the danger?”</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L3415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3415"></td>
        <td id="LC3415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, you know what my instructions are. I am sorry to intrude, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3416"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3421"></td>

        <td id="L3426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3426"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3506"></td>
        <td id="LC3506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Quite in the back row, eh? But her brother was well up to the front.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3507"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3595"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3596"></td>
        <td id="LC3596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So there is one of our small mysteries cleared up. It is something to</td>

        <td id="L3597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3597"></td>
        <td id="LC3597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have touched bottom anywhere in this bog in which we are floundering.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3598"></td>
        <td id="LC3598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We know now why Stapleton looked with disfavour upon his sister’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3599"></td>
        <td id="LC3599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suitor--even when that suitor was so eligible a one as Sir Henry. And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3600"></td>
        <td id="LC3600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now I pass on to another thread which I have extricated out of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3601"></td>
        <td id="LC3601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tangled skein, the mystery of the sobs in the night, of the tear-stained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3602"></td>
        <td id="LC3602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face of Mrs. Barrymore, of the secret journey of the butler to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3603"></td>
        <td id="LC3603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">western lattice window. Congratulate me, my dear Holmes, and tell me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3604"></td>
        <td id="LC3604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I have not disappointed you as an agent--that you do not regret</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3605"></td>
        <td id="LC3605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the confidence which you showed in me when you sent me down. All these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3606"></td>
        <td id="LC3606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things have by one night’s work been thoroughly cleared.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3607"></td>
        <td id="LC3607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3608"></td>
        <td id="LC3608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have said “by one night’s work,” but, in truth, it was by two nights’</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3609"></td>
        <td id="LC3609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work, for on the first we drew entirely blank. I sat up with Sir Henry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3610"></td>
        <td id="LC3610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his rooms until nearly three o’clock in the morning, but no sound of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3611"></td>
        <td id="LC3611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any sort did we hear except the chiming clock upon the stairs. It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3612"></td>
        <td id="LC3612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a most melancholy vigil and ended by each of us falling asleep in our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3613"></td>
        <td id="LC3613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chairs. Fortunately we were not discouraged, and we determined to try</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3614"></td>
        <td id="LC3614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again. The next night we lowered the lamp and sat smoking cigarettes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3615"></td>
        <td id="LC3615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without making the least sound. It was incredible how slowly the hours</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3616"></td>
        <td id="LC3616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crawled by, and yet we were helped through it by the same sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3617"></td>
        <td id="LC3617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patient interest which the hunter must feel as he watches the trap into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3618"></td>
        <td id="LC3618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he hopes the game may wander. One struck, and two, and we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3619"></td>
        <td id="LC3619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost for the second time given it up in despair when in an instant we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3620"></td>
        <td id="LC3620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both sat bolt upright in our chairs with all our weary senses keenly on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3621"></td>
        <td id="LC3621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the alert once more. We had heard the creak of a step in the passage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3622"></td>
        <td id="LC3622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3623"></td>
        <td id="LC3623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very stealthily we heard it pass along until it died away in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3624"></td>
        <td id="LC3624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distance. Then the baronet gently opened his door and we set out in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3625"></td>
        <td id="LC3625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pursuit. Already our man had gone round the gallery and the corridor was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3626"></td>
        <td id="LC3626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all in darkness. Softly we stole along until we had come into the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3627"></td>
        <td id="LC3627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wing. We were just in time to catch a glimpse of the tall, black-bearded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3628"></td>
        <td id="LC3628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">figure, his shoulders rounded as he tiptoed down the passage. Then he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3629"></td>
        <td id="LC3629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed through the same door as before, and the light of the candle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3630"></td>
        <td id="LC3630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">framed it in the darkness and shot one single yellow beam across the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3631"></td>
        <td id="LC3631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloom of the corridor. We shuffled cautiously towards it, trying every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3632"></td>
        <td id="LC3632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plank before we dared to put our whole weight upon it. We had taken the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3633"></td>
        <td id="LC3633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">precaution of leaving our boots behind us, but, even so, the old boards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3634"></td>
        <td id="LC3634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snapped and creaked beneath our tread. Sometimes it seemed impossible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3635"></td>
        <td id="LC3635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he should fail to hear our approach. However, the man is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3636"></td>
        <td id="LC3636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortunately rather deaf, and he was entirely preoccupied in that which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3637"></td>
        <td id="LC3637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was doing. When at last we reached the door and peeped through we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3638"></td>
        <td id="LC3638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found him crouching at the window, candle in hand, his white, intent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3639"></td>
        <td id="LC3639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face pressed against the pane, exactly as I had seen him two nights</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3640"></td>
        <td id="LC3640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3641"></td>
        <td id="LC3641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3642"></td>
        <td id="LC3642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We had arranged no plan of campaign, but the baronet is a man to whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3643"></td>
        <td id="LC3643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the most direct way is always the most natural. He walked into the room,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3644"></td>
        <td id="LC3644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and as he did so Barrymore sprang up from the window with a sharp hiss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3645"></td>
        <td id="LC3645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his breath and stood, livid and trembling, before us. His dark eyes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3646"></td>
        <td id="LC3646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glaring out of the white mask of his face, were full of horror and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3647"></td>
        <td id="LC3647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">astonishment as he gazed from Sir Henry to me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3648"></td>
        <td id="LC3648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3649"></td>
        <td id="LC3649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What are you doing here, Barrymore?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3650"></td>
        <td id="LC3650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3651"></td>
        <td id="LC3651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Nothing, sir.” His agitation was so great that he could hardly speak,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3652"></td>
        <td id="LC3652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the shadows sprang up and down from the shaking of his candle. “It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3653"></td>
        <td id="LC3653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was the window, sir. I go round at night to see that they are fastened.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3654"></td>
        <td id="LC3654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3655"></td>
        <td id="LC3655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“On the second floor?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3656"></td>
        <td id="LC3656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3657"></td>
        <td id="LC3657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, sir, all the windows.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3658"></td>
        <td id="LC3658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3659"></td>
        <td id="LC3659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Look here, Barrymore,” said Sir Henry sternly, “we have made up our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3660"></td>
        <td id="LC3660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minds to have the truth out of you, so it will save you trouble to tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3661"></td>
        <td id="LC3661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it sooner rather than later. Come, now! No lies! What were you doing at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3662"></td>
        <td id="LC3662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that window?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3663"></td>
        <td id="LC3663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3664"></td>
        <td id="LC3664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The fellow looked at us in a helpless way, and he wrung his hands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3665"></td>
        <td id="LC3665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together like one who is in the last extremity of doubt and misery.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3666"></td>
        <td id="LC3666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3667"></td>
        <td id="LC3667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I was doing no harm, sir. I was holding a candle to the window.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3668"></td>
        <td id="LC3668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3669"></td>
        <td id="LC3669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And why were you holding a candle to the window?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3670"></td>
        <td id="LC3670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3671"></td>
        <td id="LC3671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Don’t ask me, Sir Henry--don’t ask me! I give you my word, sir, that it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3672"></td>
        <td id="LC3672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is not my secret, and that I cannot tell it. If it concerned no one but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3673"></td>
        <td id="LC3673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself I would not try to keep it from you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3674"></td>
        <td id="LC3674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3675"></td>
        <td id="LC3675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A sudden idea occurred to me, and I took the candle from the trembling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3676"></td>
        <td id="LC3676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand of the butler.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3677"></td>
        <td id="LC3677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3678"></td>
        <td id="LC3678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He must have been holding it as a signal,” said I. “Let us see if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3679"></td>
        <td id="LC3679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is any answer.” I held it as he had done, and stared out into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3680"></td>
        <td id="LC3680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darkness of the night. Vaguely I could discern the black bank of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3681"></td>
        <td id="LC3681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trees and the lighter expanse of the moor, for the moon was behind the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3682"></td>
        <td id="LC3682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clouds. And then I gave a cry of exultation, for a tiny pinpoint of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3683"></td>
        <td id="LC3683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yellow light had suddenly transfixed the dark veil, and glowed steadily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3684"></td>
        <td id="LC3684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the centre of the black square framed by the window.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3685"></td>
        <td id="LC3685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3686"></td>
        <td id="LC3686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There it is!” I cried.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3687"></td>
        <td id="LC3687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3688"></td>
        <td id="LC3688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, no, sir, it is nothing--nothing at all!” the butler broke in; “I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3689"></td>
        <td id="LC3689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assure you, sir--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3690"></td>
        <td id="LC3690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3691"></td>
        <td id="LC3691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Move your light across the window, Watson!” cried the baronet. “See,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3692"></td>
        <td id="LC3692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other moves also! Now, you rascal, do you deny that it is a signal?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3693"></td>
        <td id="LC3693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Come, speak up! Who is your confederate out yonder, and what is this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3694"></td>
        <td id="LC3694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conspiracy that is going on?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3695"></td>
        <td id="LC3695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3696"></td>
        <td id="LC3696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The man’s face became openly defiant. “It is my business, and not yours.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3697"></td>
        <td id="LC3697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will not tell.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3698"></td>
        <td id="LC3698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3699"></td>
        <td id="LC3699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then you leave my employment right away.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3700"></td>
        <td id="LC3700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3701"></td>
        <td id="LC3701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Very good, sir. If I must I must.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3702"></td>
        <td id="LC3702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3703"></td>
        <td id="LC3703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And you go in disgrace. By thunder, you may well be ashamed of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3704"></td>
        <td id="LC3704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yourself. Your family has lived with mine for over a hundred years under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3705"></td>
        <td id="LC3705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this roof, and here I find you deep in some dark plot against me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3706"></td>
        <td id="LC3706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3707"></td>
        <td id="LC3707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, no, sir; no, not against you!” It was a woman’s voice, and Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3708"></td>
        <td id="LC3708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Barrymore, paler and more horror-struck than her husband, was standing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3709"></td>
        <td id="LC3709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the door. Her bulky figure in a shawl and skirt might have been comic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3710"></td>
        <td id="LC3710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were it not for the intensity of feeling upon her face.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3711"></td>
        <td id="LC3711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3712"></td>
        <td id="LC3712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We have to go, Eliza. This is the end of it. You can pack our things,”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3713"></td>
        <td id="LC3713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> said the butler.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3714"></td>
        <td id="LC3714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3715"></td>
        <td id="LC3715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, John, John, have I brought you to this? It is my doing, Sir</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3716"></td>
        <td id="LC3716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Henry--all mine. He has done nothing except for my sake and because I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3717"></td>
        <td id="LC3717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asked him.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3718"></td>
        <td id="LC3718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3719"></td>
        <td id="LC3719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Speak out, then! What does it mean?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3720"></td>
        <td id="LC3720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3721"></td>
        <td id="LC3721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My unhappy brother is starving on the moor. We cannot let him perish at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3722"></td>
        <td id="LC3722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our very gates. The light is a signal to him that food is ready for him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3723"></td>
        <td id="LC3723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and his light out yonder is to show the spot to which to bring it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3724"></td>
        <td id="LC3724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3725"></td>
        <td id="LC3725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then your brother is--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3726"></td>
        <td id="LC3726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3727"></td>
        <td id="LC3727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The escaped convict, sir--Selden, the criminal.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3728"></td>
        <td id="LC3728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3729"></td>
        <td id="LC3729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That’s the truth, sir,” said Barrymore. “I said that it was not my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3730"></td>
        <td id="LC3730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secret and that I could not tell it to you. But now you have heard it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3731"></td>
        <td id="LC3731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and you will see that if there was a plot it was not against you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3732"></td>
        <td id="LC3732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3733"></td>
        <td id="LC3733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This, then, was the explanation of the stealthy expeditions at night</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3734"></td>
        <td id="LC3734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the light at the window. Sir Henry and I both stared at the woman in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3735"></td>
        <td id="LC3735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amazement. Was it possible that this stolidly respectable person was of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3736"></td>
        <td id="LC3736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same blood as one of the most notorious criminals in the country?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3737"></td>
        <td id="LC3737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3738"></td>
        <td id="LC3738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, sir, my name was Selden, and he is my younger brother. We humoured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3739"></td>
        <td id="LC3739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him too much when he was a lad and gave him his own way in everything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3740"></td>
        <td id="LC3740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">until he came to think that the world was made for his pleasure, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3741"></td>
        <td id="LC3741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he could do what he liked in it. Then as he grew older he met</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3742"></td>
        <td id="LC3742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wicked companions, and the devil entered into him until he broke my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3743"></td>
        <td id="LC3743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother’s heart and dragged our name in the dirt. From crime to crime</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3744"></td>
        <td id="LC3744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he sank lower and lower until it is only the mercy of God which has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3745"></td>
        <td id="LC3745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snatched him from the scaffold; but to me, sir, he was always the little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3746"></td>
        <td id="LC3746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curly-headed boy that I had nursed and played with as an elder sister</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3747"></td>
        <td id="LC3747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would. That was why he broke prison, sir. He knew that I was here and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3748"></td>
        <td id="LC3748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that we could not refuse to help him. When he dragged himself here one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3749"></td>
        <td id="LC3749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night, weary and starving, with the warders hard at his heels, what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3750"></td>
        <td id="LC3750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could we do? We took him in and fed him and cared for him. Then you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3751"></td>
        <td id="LC3751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">returned, sir, and my brother thought he would be safer on the moor than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3752"></td>
        <td id="LC3752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anywhere else until the hue and cry was over, so he lay in hiding there.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3753"></td>
        <td id="LC3753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But every second night we made sure if he was still there by putting a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3754"></td>
        <td id="LC3754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light in the window, and if there was an answer my husband took out some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3755"></td>
        <td id="LC3755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bread and meat to him. Every day we hoped that he was gone, but as long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3756"></td>
        <td id="LC3756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as he was there we could not desert him. That is the whole truth, as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3757"></td>
        <td id="LC3757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am an honest Christian woman and you will see that if there is blame in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3758"></td>
        <td id="LC3758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the matter it does not lie with my husband but with me, for whose sake</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3759"></td>
        <td id="LC3759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he has done all that he has.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3760"></td>
        <td id="LC3760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3761"></td>
        <td id="LC3761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The woman’s words came with an intense earnestness which carried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3762"></td>
        <td id="LC3762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conviction with them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3763"></td>
        <td id="LC3763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3764"></td>
        <td id="LC3764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is this true, Barrymore?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3765"></td>
        <td id="LC3765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3766"></td>
        <td id="LC3766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, Sir Henry. Every word of it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3767"></td>
        <td id="LC3767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3768"></td>
        <td id="LC3768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, I cannot blame you for standing by your own wife. Forget what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3769"></td>
        <td id="LC3769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have said. Go to your room, you two, and we shall talk further about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3770"></td>
        <td id="LC3770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this matter in the morning.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3771"></td>
        <td id="LC3771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3772"></td>
        <td id="LC3772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When they were gone we looked out of the window again. Sir Henry had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3773"></td>
        <td id="LC3773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flung it open, and the cold night wind beat in upon our faces. Far away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3774"></td>
        <td id="LC3774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the black distance there still glowed that one tiny point of yellow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3775"></td>
        <td id="LC3775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3776"></td>
        <td id="LC3776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3777"></td>
        <td id="LC3777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I wonder he dares,” said Sir Henry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3778"></td>
        <td id="LC3778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3779"></td>
        <td id="LC3779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It may be so placed as to be only visible from here.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3780"></td>
        <td id="LC3780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3781"></td>
        <td id="LC3781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Very likely. How far do you think it is?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3782"></td>
        <td id="LC3782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3783"></td>
        <td id="LC3783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Out by the Cleft Tor, I think.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3784"></td>
        <td id="LC3784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3785"></td>
        <td id="LC3785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not more than a mile or two off.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3786"></td>
        <td id="LC3786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3787"></td>
        <td id="LC3787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hardly that.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3788"></td>
        <td id="LC3788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3789"></td>
        <td id="LC3789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, it cannot be far if Barrymore had to carry out the food to it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3790"></td>
        <td id="LC3790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And he is waiting, this villain, beside that candle. By thunder, Watson,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3791"></td>
        <td id="LC3791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am going out to take that man!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3792"></td>
        <td id="LC3792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3793"></td>
        <td id="LC3793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The same thought had crossed my own mind. It was not as if the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3794"></td>
        <td id="LC3794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Barrymores had taken us into their confidence. Their secret had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3795"></td>
        <td id="LC3795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forced from them. The man was a danger to the community, an unmitigated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3796"></td>
        <td id="LC3796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scoundrel for whom there was neither pity nor excuse. We were only doing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3797"></td>
        <td id="LC3797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our duty in taking this chance of putting him back where he could do no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3798"></td>
        <td id="LC3798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harm. With his brutal and violent nature, others would have to pay the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3799"></td>
        <td id="LC3799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">price if we held our hands. Any night, for example, our neighbours the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3800"></td>
        <td id="LC3800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Stapletons might be attacked by him, and it may have been the thought of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3801"></td>
        <td id="LC3801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this which made Sir Henry so keen upon the adventure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3802"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3803"></td>
        <td id="LC3803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I will come,” said I.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3804"></td>
        <td id="LC3804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3805"></td>
        <td id="LC3805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then get your revolver and put on your boots. The sooner we start the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3806"></td>
        <td id="LC3806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better, as the fellow may put out his light and be off.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3807"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3808"></td>
        <td id="LC3808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In five minutes we were outside the door, starting upon our expedition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3809"></td>
        <td id="LC3809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We hurried through the dark shrubbery, amid the dull moaning of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3810"></td>
        <td id="LC3810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">autumn wind and the rustle of the falling leaves. The night air was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3811"></td>
        <td id="LC3811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heavy with the smell of damp and decay. Now and again the moon peeped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3812"></td>
        <td id="LC3812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out for an instant, but clouds were driving over the face of the sky,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3813"></td>
        <td id="LC3813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and just as we came out on the moor a thin rain began to fall. The light</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3814"></td>
        <td id="LC3814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still burned steadily in front.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3815"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3816"></td>
        <td id="LC3816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Are you armed?” I asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3817"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3820"></td>
        <td id="LC3820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We must close in on him rapidly, for he is said to be a desperate</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3823"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3824"></td>
        <td id="LC3824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I say, Watson,” said the baronet, “what would Holmes say to this? How</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3825"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3826"></td>
        <td id="LC3826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3827"></td>
        <td id="LC3827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As if in answer to his words there rose suddenly out of the vast gloom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3828"></td>
        <td id="LC3828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the moor that strange cry which I had already heard upon the borders</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3829"></td>
        <td id="LC3829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the great Grimpen Mire. It came with the wind through the silence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3830"></td>
        <td id="LC3830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the night, a long, deep mutter, then a rising howl, and then the sad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3831"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3833"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3835"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3836"></td>

</td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3840"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3842"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3858"></td>
        <td id="LC3858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I hesitated but could not escape the question.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3859"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3861"></td>
        <td id="LC3861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3862"></td>
        <td id="LC3862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He groaned and was silent for a few moments.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3863"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3867"></td>
        <td id="LC3867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was hard to say whence it came.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3868"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3869"></td>
        <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It rose and fell with the wind. Isn’t that the direction of the great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3870"></td>
        <td id="LC3870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Grimpen Mire?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3871"></td>
        <td id="LC3871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3872"></td>
        <td id="LC3872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, it is.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3873"></td>
        <td id="LC3873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3874"></td>
        <td id="LC3874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, it was up there. Come now, Watson, didn’t you think yourself that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3875"></td>
        <td id="LC3875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was the cry of a hound? I am not a child. You need not fear to speak</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3876"></td>
        <td id="LC3876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the truth.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3877"></td>
        <td id="LC3877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3878"></td>
        <td id="LC3878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Stapleton was with me when I heard it last. He said that it might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3879"></td>
        <td id="LC3879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the calling of a strange bird.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3880"></td>
        <td id="LC3880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3881"></td>
        <td id="LC3881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, no, it was a hound. My God, can there be some truth in all these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3882"></td>
        <td id="LC3882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stories? Is it possible that I am really in danger from so dark a cause?</td>

        <td id="L3973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3973"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3975"></td>
        <td id="LC3975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of surprise I pointed him out to the baronet, but in the instant during</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3976"></td>
        <td id="LC3976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I had turned to grasp his arm the man was gone. There was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3977"></td>
        <td id="LC3977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sharp pinnacle of granite still cutting the lower edge of the moon, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3978"></td>
        <td id="LC3978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its peak bore no trace of that silent and motionless figure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3979"></td>
        <td id="LC3979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3980"></td>
        <td id="LC3980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I wished to go in that direction and to search the tor, but it was some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3981"></td>
        <td id="LC3981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distance away. The baronet’s nerves were still quivering from that cry,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3982"></td>
        <td id="LC3982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which recalled the dark story of his family, and he was not in the mood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3983"></td>
        <td id="LC3983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for fresh adventures. He had not seen this lonely man upon the tor and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3984"></td>
        <td id="LC3984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not feel the thrill which his strange presence and his commanding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3985"></td>
        <td id="LC3985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attitude had given to me. “A warder, no doubt,” said he. “The moor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3986"></td>
        <td id="LC3986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has been thick with them since this fellow escaped.” Well, perhaps his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3987"></td>
        <td id="LC3987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">explanation may be the right one, but I should like to have some further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3988"></td>
        <td id="LC3988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proof of it. Today we mean to communicate to the Princetown people where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3989"></td>
        <td id="LC3989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they should look for their missing man, but it is hard lines that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3990"></td>
        <td id="LC3990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we have not actually had the triumph of bringing him back as our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3991"></td>
        <td id="LC3991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own prisoner. Such are the adventures of last night, and you must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3992"></td>
        <td id="LC3992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acknowledge, my dear Holmes, that I have done you very well in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3993"></td>
        <td id="LC3993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the matter of a report. Much of what I tell you is no doubt quite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3994"></td>
        <td id="LC3994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">irrelevant, but still I feel that it is best that I should let you have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3995"></td>
        <td id="LC3995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the facts and leave you to select for yourself those which will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3996"></td>
        <td id="LC3996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be of most service to you in helping you to your conclusions. We are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3997"></td>
        <td id="LC3997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainly making some progress. So far as the Barrymores go we have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3998"></td>
        <td id="LC3998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found the motive of their actions, and that has cleared up the situation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3999"></td>
        <td id="LC3999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very much. But the moor with its mysteries and its strange inhabitants</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4000"></td>
        <td id="LC4000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remains as inscrutable as ever. Perhaps in my next I may be able to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4001"></td>
        <td id="LC4001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throw some light upon this also. Best of all would it be if you could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4002"></td>
        <td id="LC4002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come down to us. In any case you will hear from me again in the course</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4003"></td>
        <td id="LC4003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the next few days.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4004"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4005"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4006"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4007"></td>
