</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4008"></td>
        <td id="LC4008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So far I have been able to quote from the reports which I have forwarded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4009"></td>
        <td id="LC4009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">during these early days to Sherlock Holmes. Now, however, I have arrived</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4010"></td>
        <td id="LC4010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at a point in my narrative where I am compelled to abandon this method</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4011"></td>
        <td id="LC4011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to trust once more to my recollections, aided by the diary which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4012"></td>
        <td id="LC4012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I kept at the time. A few extracts from the latter will carry me on to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4013"></td>
        <td id="LC4013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those scenes which are indelibly fixed in every detail upon my memory. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4014"></td>
        <td id="LC4014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceed, then, from the morning which followed our abortive chase of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4015"></td>
        <td id="LC4015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">convict and our other strange experiences upon the moor.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4016"></td>
        <td id="LC4016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4017"></td>
        <td id="LC4017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">October 16th. A dull and foggy day with a drizzle of rain. The house</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4018"></td>
        <td id="LC4018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is banked in with rolling clouds, which rise now and then to show the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4019"></td>
        <td id="LC4019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreary curves of the moor, with thin, silver veins upon the sides of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4020"></td>
        <td id="LC4020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hills, and the distant boulders gleaming where the light strikes upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4021"></td>
        <td id="LC4021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their wet faces. It is melancholy outside and in. The baronet is in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4022"></td>
        <td id="LC4022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">black reaction after the excitements of the night. I am conscious myself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4023"></td>
        <td id="LC4023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a weight at my heart and a feeling of impending danger--ever present</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4024"></td>
        <td id="LC4024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">danger, which is the more terrible because I am unable to define it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4025"></td>
        <td id="LC4025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4026"></td>
        <td id="LC4026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And have I not cause for such a feeling? Consider the long sequence of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4027"></td>
        <td id="LC4027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incidents which have all pointed to some sinister influence which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4028"></td>
        <td id="LC4028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at work around us. There is the death of the last occupant of the Hall,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4029"></td>
        <td id="LC4029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fulfilling so exactly the conditions of the family legend, and there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4030"></td>
        <td id="LC4030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are the repeated reports from peasants of the appearance of a strange</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4031"></td>
        <td id="LC4031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creature upon the moor. Twice I have with my own ears heard the sound</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4032"></td>
        <td id="LC4032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which resembled the distant baying of a hound. It is incredible,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4033"></td>
        <td id="LC4033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impossible, that it should really be outside the ordinary laws of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4034"></td>
        <td id="LC4034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature. A spectral hound which leaves material footmarks and fills the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4035"></td>
        <td id="LC4035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">air with its howling is surely not to be thought of. Stapleton may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4036"></td>
        <td id="LC4036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fall in with such a superstition, and Mortimer also, but if I have one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4037"></td>
        <td id="LC4037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quality upon earth it is common sense, and nothing will persuade me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4038"></td>
        <td id="LC4038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believe in such a thing. To do so would be to descend to the level of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4039"></td>
        <td id="LC4039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these poor peasants, who are not content with a mere fiend dog but must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4040"></td>
        <td id="LC4040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">needs describe him with hell-fire shooting from his mouth and eyes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4041"></td>
        <td id="LC4041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes would not listen to such fancies, and I am his agent. But facts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4042"></td>
        <td id="LC4042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are facts, and I have twice heard this crying upon the moor. Suppose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4043"></td>
        <td id="LC4043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that there were really some huge hound loose upon it; that would go far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4044"></td>
        <td id="LC4044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to explain everything. But where could such a hound lie concealed, where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4045"></td>
        <td id="LC4045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did it get its food, where did it come from, how was it that no one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4046"></td>
        <td id="LC4046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw it by day? It must be confessed that the natural explanation offers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4047"></td>
        <td id="LC4047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost as many difficulties as the other. And always, apart from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4048"></td>
        <td id="LC4048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hound, there is the fact of the human agency in London, the man in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4049"></td>
        <td id="LC4049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cab, and the letter which warned Sir Henry against the moor. This at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4050"></td>
        <td id="LC4050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">least was real, but it might have been the work of a protecting friend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4051"></td>
        <td id="LC4051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as easily as of an enemy. Where is that friend or enemy now? Has he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4052"></td>
        <td id="LC4052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remained in London, or has he followed us down here? Could he--could he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4053"></td>
        <td id="LC4053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be the stranger whom I saw upon the tor?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4054"></td>
        <td id="LC4054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4055"></td>
        <td id="LC4055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is true that I have had only the one glance at him, and yet there are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4056"></td>
        <td id="LC4056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some things to which I am ready to swear. He is no one whom I have seen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4057"></td>
        <td id="LC4057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down here, and I have now met all the neighbours. The figure was far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4058"></td>
        <td id="LC4058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taller than that of Stapleton, far thinner than that of Frankland.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4059"></td>
        <td id="LC4059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Barrymore it might possibly have been, but we had left him behind us,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4060"></td>
        <td id="LC4060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I am certain that he could not have followed us. A stranger then is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4061"></td>
        <td id="LC4061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still dogging us, just as a stranger dogged us in London. We have never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4062"></td>
        <td id="LC4062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shaken him off. If I could lay my hands upon that man, then at last we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4063"></td>
        <td id="LC4063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might find ourselves at the end of all our difficulties. To this one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4064"></td>
        <td id="LC4064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purpose I must now devote all my energies.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4065"></td>
        <td id="LC4065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4066"></td>
        <td id="LC4066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My first impulse was to tell Sir Henry all my plans. My second and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4067"></td>
        <td id="LC4067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wisest one is to play my own game and speak as little as possible to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4068"></td>
        <td id="LC4068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anyone. He is silent and distrait. His nerves have been strangely shaken</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4069"></td>
        <td id="LC4069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by that sound upon the moor. I will say nothing to add to his anxieties,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4070"></td>
        <td id="LC4070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but I will take my own steps to attain my own end.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4071"></td>
        <td id="LC4071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4072"></td>
        <td id="LC4072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We had a small scene this morning after breakfast. Barrymore asked leave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4073"></td>
        <td id="LC4073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to speak with Sir Henry, and they were closeted in his study some little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4074"></td>
        <td id="LC4074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time. Sitting in the billiard-room I more than once heard the sound of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4075"></td>
        <td id="LC4075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voices raised, and I had a pretty good idea what the point was which was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4076"></td>
        <td id="LC4076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under discussion. After a time the baronet opened his door and called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4077"></td>
        <td id="LC4077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for me. “Barrymore considers that he has a grievance,” he said. “He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4078"></td>
        <td id="LC4078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thinks that it was unfair on our part to hunt his brother-in-law down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4079"></td>
        <td id="LC4079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he, of his own free will, had told us the secret.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4080"></td>
        <td id="LC4080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4081"></td>
        <td id="LC4081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The butler was standing very pale but very collected before us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4082"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4083"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4084"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4085"></td>
        <td id="LC4085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I heard you two gentlemen come back this morning and learned that you</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4086"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4089"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4092"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4093"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4095"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4096"></td>
        <td id="LC4096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The man is a public danger. There are lonely houses scattered over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4097"></td>
        <td id="LC4097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moor, and he is a fellow who would stick at nothing. You only want to</td>

        <td id="L4098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4098"></td>

        <td id="LC4099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for example, with no one but himself to defend it. There’s no safety for</td>

        <td id="L4100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4100"></td>
        <td id="LC4100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anyone until he is under lock and key.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4101"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4102"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4104"></td>
        <td id="LC4104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sir Henry, that in a very few days the necessary arrangements will have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4105"></td>
        <td id="LC4105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been made and he will be on his way to South America. For God’s sake,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4106"></td>
        <td id="LC4106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sir, I beg of you not to let the police know that he is still on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4107"></td>
        <td id="LC4107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moor. They have given up the chase there, and he can lie quiet until the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4108"></td>
        <td id="LC4108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ship is ready for him. You can’t tell on him without getting my wife and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4109"></td>
        <td id="LC4109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me into trouble. I beg you, sir, to say nothing to the police.”</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L4113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4113"></td>

        <td id="LC4114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relieve the tax-payer of a burden.”</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L4153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4153"></td>

        <td id="LC4154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I can’t give you the name, sir, but I can give you the initials. Her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4155"></td>
        <td id="LC4155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">initials were L. L.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4156"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4157"></td>
        <td id="LC4157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How do you know this, Barrymore?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4158"></td>
        <td id="LC4158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4159"></td>
        <td id="LC4159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, Sir Henry, your uncle had a letter that morning. He had usually a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4160"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4253"></td>

        <td id="L4254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4254"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4346"></td>
        <td id="LC4346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Watson--I tell you straight, sir, that I don’t like it.” He spoke with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4347"></td>
        <td id="LC4347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sudden passion of earnestness.</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4635"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4724"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4726"></td>
        <td id="LC4726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rascals in any way.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4727"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4816"></td>
        <td id="LC4816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“They have treated me shamefully--shamefully. When the facts come out in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4817"></td>
        <td id="LC4817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Frankland v. Regina I venture to think that a thrill of indignation will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4818"></td>
        <td id="LC4818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">run through the country. Nothing would induce me to help the police in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4819"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4820"></td>
        <td id="LC4820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which these rascals burned at the stake. Surely you are not going! You</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4821"></td>
        <td id="LC4821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will help me to empty the decanter in honour of this great occasion!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4822"></td>
        <td id="LC4822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4823"></td>
        <td id="LC4823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But I resisted all his solicitations and succeeded in dissuading him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4824"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4825"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4826"></td>
        <td id="LC4826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made for the stony hill over which the boy had disappeared. Everything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4827"></td>
        <td id="LC4827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was working in my favour, and I swore that it should not be through lack</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4831"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4911"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4912"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5104"></td>
        <td id="LC5104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5105"></td>
        <td id="LC5105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But are you sure of this, Holmes? How do you know that the woman is his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5106"></td>
        <td id="LC5106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wife?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5107"></td>
        <td id="LC5107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5108"></td>
        <td id="LC5108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Because he so far forgot himself as to tell you a true piece of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5109"></td>
        <td id="LC5109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">autobiography upon the occasion when he first met you, and I dare say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5110"></td>
        <td id="LC5110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he has many a time regretted it since. He was once a schoolmaster in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5111"></td>
        <td id="LC5111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the north of England. Now, there is no one more easy to trace than a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5112"></td>
        <td id="LC5112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">schoolmaster. There are scholastic agencies by which one may identify</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5113"></td>
        <td id="LC5113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any man who has been in the profession. A little investigation showed me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5114"></td>
        <td id="LC5114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that a school had come to grief under atrocious circumstances, and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5115"></td>
        <td id="LC5115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the man who had owned it--the name was different--had disappeared with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5116"></td>
        <td id="LC5116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his wife. The descriptions agreed. When I learned that the missing man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5117"></td>
        <td id="LC5117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was devoted to entomology the identification was complete.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5118"></td>
        <td id="LC5118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5119"></td>
        <td id="LC5119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The darkness was rising, but much was still hidden by the shadows.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5120"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5121"></td>
        <td id="LC5121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If this woman is in truth his wife, where does Mrs. Laura Lyons come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5122"></td>
        <td id="LC5122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in?” I asked.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5123"></td>
        <td id="LC5123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5124"></td>
        <td id="LC5124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That is one of the points upon which your own researches have shed a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5125"></td>
        <td id="LC5125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light. Your interview with the lady has cleared the situation very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5126"></td>
        <td id="LC5126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much. I did not know about a projected divorce between herself and her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5127"></td>
        <td id="LC5127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husband. In that case, regarding Stapleton as an unmarried man, she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5128"></td>
        <td id="LC5128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">counted no doubt upon becoming his wife.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5129"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5130"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5131"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5132"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC5133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to see her--both of us--tomorrow. Don’t you think, Watson, that you are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5134"></td>
        <td id="LC5134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away from your charge rather long? Your place should be at Baskerville</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5135"></td>
        <td id="LC5135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hall.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5136"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5137"></td>
        <td id="LC5137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The last red streaks had faded away in the west and night had settled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5138"></td>
        <td id="LC5138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the moor. A few faint stars were gleaming in a violet sky.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5139"></td>
        <td id="LC5139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5140"></td>
        <td id="LC5140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“One last question, Holmes,” I said as I rose. “Surely there is no need</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5141"></td>
        <td id="LC5141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of secrecy between you and me. What is the meaning of it all? What is he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5142"></td>
        <td id="LC5142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5143"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5144"></td>
        <td id="LC5144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes’s voice sank as he answered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5145"></td>
        <td id="LC5145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5146"></td>
        <td id="LC5146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is murder, Watson--refined, cold-blooded, deliberate murder. Do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5147"></td>
        <td id="LC5147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ask me for particulars. My nets are closing upon him, even as his are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5148"></td>
        <td id="LC5148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon Sir Henry, and with your help he is already almost at my mercy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5149"></td>
        <td id="LC5149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is but one danger which can threaten us. It is that he should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5150"></td>
        <td id="LC5150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strike before we are ready to do so. Another day--two at the most--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5151"></td>
        <td id="LC5151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have my case complete, but until then guard your charge as closely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5152"></td>
        <td id="LC5152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as ever a fond mother watched her ailing child. Your mission today has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5153"></td>
        <td id="LC5153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justified itself, and yet I could almost wish that you had not left his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC5154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side. Hark!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5155"></td>
        <td id="LC5155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5156"></td>
        <td id="LC5156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A terrible scream--a prolonged yell of horror and anguish--burst out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5157"></td>
        <td id="LC5157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the silence of the moor. That frightful cry turned the blood to ice in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5158"></td>
        <td id="LC5158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my veins.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5159"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5161"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5162"></td>
        <td id="LC5162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes had sprung to his feet, and I saw his dark, athletic outline at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5163"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC5164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his face peering into the darkness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5165"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5166"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5167"></td>
        <td id="LC5167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5168"></td>
        <td id="LC5168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The cry had been loud on account of its vehemence, but it had pealed out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5169"></td>
        <td id="LC5169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from somewhere far off on the shadowy plain. Now it burst upon our ears,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5170"></td>
        <td id="LC5170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nearer, louder, more urgent than before.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5171"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5172"></td>
        <td id="LC5172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Where is it?” Holmes whispered; and I knew from the thrill of his voice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5173"></td>
        <td id="LC5173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he, the man of iron, was shaken to the soul. “Where is it, Watson?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5174"></td>
        <td id="LC5174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5175"></td>
        <td id="LC5175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There, I think.” I pointed into the darkness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5176"></td>
        <td id="LC5176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5177"></td>
        <td id="LC5177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, there!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5178"></td>
        <td id="LC5178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5179"></td>
        <td id="LC5179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Again the agonized cry swept through the silent night, louder and much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5180"></td>
        <td id="LC5180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nearer than ever. And a new sound mingled with it, a deep, muttered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5181"></td>
        <td id="LC5181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rumble, musical and yet menacing, rising and falling like the low,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5182"></td>
        <td id="LC5182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constant murmur of the sea.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5183"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5184"></td>
        <td id="LC5184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The hound!” cried Holmes. “Come, Watson, come! Great heavens, if we are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5185"></td>
        <td id="LC5185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too late!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5186"></td>
        <td id="LC5186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5187"></td>
        <td id="LC5187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had started running swiftly over the moor, and I had followed at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5188"></td>
        <td id="LC5188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heels. But now from somewhere among the broken ground immediately in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5189"></td>
        <td id="LC5189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">front of us there came one last despairing yell, and then a dull, heavy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5190"></td>
        <td id="LC5190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thud. We halted and listened. Not another sound broke the heavy silence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5191"></td>
        <td id="LC5191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the windless night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5192"></td>
        <td id="LC5192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5193"></td>
        <td id="LC5193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I saw Holmes put his hand to his forehead like a man distracted. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5194"></td>
        <td id="LC5194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stamped his feet upon the ground.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5195"></td>
        <td id="LC5195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5196"></td>
        <td id="LC5196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He has beaten us, Watson. We are too late.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5197"></td>
        <td id="LC5197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5198"></td>
        <td id="LC5198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, no, surely not!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5199"></td>
        <td id="LC5199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5200"></td>
        <td id="LC5200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Fool that I was to hold my hand. And you, Watson, see what comes of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5201"></td>
        <td id="LC5201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">abandoning your charge! But, by Heaven, if the worst has happened we’ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5202"></td>
        <td id="LC5202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">avenge him!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5203"></td>
        <td id="LC5203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5204"></td>
        <td id="LC5204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Blindly we ran through the gloom, blundering against boulders, forcing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5205"></td>
        <td id="LC5205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our way through gorse bushes, panting up hills and rushing down slopes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5206"></td>
        <td id="LC5206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heading always in the direction whence those dreadful sounds had come.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5207"></td>
        <td id="LC5207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At every rise Holmes looked eagerly round him, but the shadows were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5208"></td>
        <td id="LC5208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thick upon the moor, and nothing moved upon its dreary face.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5209"></td>
        <td id="LC5209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5210"></td>
        <td id="LC5210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Can you see anything?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5211"></td>
        <td id="LC5211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5212"></td>
        <td id="LC5212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Nothing.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5213"></td>
        <td id="LC5213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5214"></td>
        <td id="LC5214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But, hark, what is that?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5215"></td>
        <td id="LC5215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5216"></td>
        <td id="LC5216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A low moan had fallen upon our ears. There it was again upon our left!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5217"></td>
        <td id="LC5217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On that side a ridge of rocks ended in a sheer cliff which overlooked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5218"></td>
        <td id="LC5218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a stone-strewn slope. On its jagged face was spread-eagled some dark,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5219"></td>
        <td id="LC5219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">irregular object. As we ran towards it the vague outline hardened into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5220"></td>
        <td id="LC5220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a definite shape. It was a prostrate man face downward upon the ground,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5221"></td>
        <td id="LC5221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the head doubled under him at a horrible angle, the shoulders rounded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5222"></td>
        <td id="LC5222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the body hunched together as if in the act of throwing a somersault.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5223"></td>
        <td id="LC5223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So grotesque was the attitude that I could not for the instant realize</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5224"></td>
        <td id="LC5224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that that moan had been the passing of his soul. Not a whisper, not a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5225"></td>
        <td id="LC5225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rustle, rose now from the dark figure over which we stooped. Holmes laid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5226"></td>
        <td id="LC5226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his hand upon him and held it up again with an exclamation of horror.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5227"></td>
        <td id="LC5227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The gleam of the match which he struck shone upon his clotted fingers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5228"></td>
        <td id="LC5228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and upon the ghastly pool which widened slowly from the crushed skull</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5229"></td>
        <td id="LC5229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the victim. And it shone upon something else which turned our hearts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5230"></td>
        <td id="LC5230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sick and faint within us--the body of Sir Henry Baskerville!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5231"></td>
        <td id="LC5231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5232"></td>
        <td id="LC5232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was no chance of either of us forgetting that peculiar ruddy tweed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5233"></td>
        <td id="LC5233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suit--the very one which he had worn on the first morning that we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5234"></td>
        <td id="LC5234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen him in Baker Street. We caught the one clear glimpse of it, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5235"></td>
        <td id="LC5235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then the match flickered and went out, even as the hope had gone out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5236"></td>
        <td id="LC5236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of our souls. Holmes groaned, and his face glimmered white through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5237"></td>
        <td id="LC5237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darkness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5238"></td>
        <td id="LC5238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5239"></td>
        <td id="LC5239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The brute! The brute!” I cried with clenched hands. “Oh Holmes, I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5240"></td>
        <td id="LC5240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never forgive myself for having left him to his fate.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5241"></td>
        <td id="LC5241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5242"></td>
        <td id="LC5242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am more to blame than you, Watson. In order to have my case well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5243"></td>
        <td id="LC5243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rounded and complete, I have thrown away the life of my client. It is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5244"></td>
        <td id="LC5244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the greatest blow which has befallen me in my career. But how could I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5245"></td>
        <td id="LC5245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know--how could I know--that he would risk his life alone upon the moor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5246"></td>
        <td id="LC5246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the face of all my warnings?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5247"></td>
        <td id="LC5247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5248"></td>
        <td id="LC5248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That we should have heard his screams--my God, those screams!--and yet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5249"></td>
        <td id="LC5249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been unable to save him! Where is this brute of a hound which drove</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5250"></td>
        <td id="LC5250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him to his death? It may be lurking among these rocks at this instant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5251"></td>
        <td id="LC5251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And Stapleton, where is he? He shall answer for this deed.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5252"></td>
        <td id="LC5252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5253"></td>
        <td id="LC5253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He shall. I will see to that. Uncle and nephew have been murdered--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5254"></td>
        <td id="LC5254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one frightened to death by the very sight of a beast which he thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5255"></td>
        <td id="LC5255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be supernatural, the other driven to his end in his wild flight to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5256"></td>
        <td id="LC5256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">escape from it. But now we have to prove the connection between the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5257"></td>
        <td id="LC5257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man and the beast. Save from what we heard, we cannot even swear to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5258"></td>
        <td id="LC5258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">existence of the latter, since Sir Henry has evidently died from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5259"></td>
        <td id="LC5259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fall. But, by heavens, cunning as he is, the fellow shall be in my power</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5260"></td>
        <td id="LC5260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before another day is past!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5261"></td>
        <td id="LC5261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5262"></td>
        <td id="LC5262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We stood with bitter hearts on either side of the mangled body,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5263"></td>
        <td id="LC5263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overwhelmed by this sudden and irrevocable disaster which had brought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5264"></td>
        <td id="LC5264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all our long and weary labours to so piteous an end. Then as the moon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5265"></td>
        <td id="LC5265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rose we climbed to the top of the rocks over which our poor friend had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5266"></td>
        <td id="LC5266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fallen, and from the summit we gazed out over the shadowy moor, half</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5267"></td>
        <td id="LC5267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silver and half gloom. Far away, miles off, in the direction of Grimpen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5268"></td>
        <td id="LC5268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a single steady yellow light was shining. It could only come from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5269"></td>
        <td id="LC5269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lonely abode of the Stapletons. With a bitter curse I shook my fist at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5270"></td>
        <td id="LC5270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it as I gazed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5271"></td>
        <td id="LC5271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5272"></td>
        <td id="LC5272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why should we not seize him at once?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5273"></td>
        <td id="LC5273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5274"></td>
        <td id="LC5274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Our case is not complete. The fellow is wary and cunning to the last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5275"></td>
        <td id="LC5275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">degree. It is not what we know, but what we can prove. If we make one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5276"></td>
        <td id="LC5276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">false move the villain may escape us yet.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5277"></td>
        <td id="LC5277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5278"></td>
        <td id="LC5278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What can we do?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5279"></td>
        <td id="LC5279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5280"></td>
        <td id="LC5280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There will be plenty for us to do tomorrow. Tonight we can only perform</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5281"></td>
        <td id="LC5281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the last offices to our poor friend.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5282"></td>
        <td id="LC5282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5283"></td>
        <td id="LC5283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Together we made our way down the precipitous slope and approached the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5284"></td>
        <td id="LC5284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body, black and clear against the silvered stones. The agony of those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5285"></td>
        <td id="LC5285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contorted limbs struck me with a spasm of pain and blurred my eyes with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5286"></td>
        <td id="LC5286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tears.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5287"></td>
        <td id="LC5287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5288"></td>
        <td id="LC5288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We must send for help, Holmes! We cannot carry him all the way to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5289"></td>
        <td id="LC5289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hall. Good heavens, are you mad?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5290"></td>
        <td id="LC5290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5291"></td>
        <td id="LC5291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had uttered a cry and bent over the body. Now he was dancing and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5292"></td>
        <td id="LC5292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughing and wringing my hand. Could this be my stern, self-contained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5293"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5387"></td>
        <td id="LC5387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What do you mean, then?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5480"></td>
        <td id="LC5480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5481"></td>
        <td id="LC5481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Found dead without a mark upon him. You and I know that he died of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5482"></td>
        <td id="LC5482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sheer fright, and we know also what frightened him, but how are we to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5483"></td>
        <td id="LC5483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get twelve stolid jurymen to know it? What signs are there of a hound?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5484"></td>
        <td id="LC5484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Where are the marks of its fangs? Of course we know that a hound does</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5485"></td>
        <td id="LC5485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not bite a dead body and that Sir Charles was dead before ever the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5486"></td>
        <td id="LC5486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brute overtook him. But we have to prove all this, and we are not in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5487"></td>
        <td id="LC5487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">position to do it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5488"></td>
        <td id="LC5488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5489"></td>
        <td id="LC5489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, then, tonight?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5490"></td>
        <td id="LC5490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5491"></td>
        <td id="LC5491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We are not much better off tonight. Again, there was no direct</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5492"></td>
        <td id="LC5492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">connection between the hound and the man’s death. We never saw the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5493"></td>
        <td id="LC5493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hound. We heard it, but we could not prove that it was running upon this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5494"></td>
        <td id="LC5494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man’s trail. There is a complete absence of motive. No, my dear fellow;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5495"></td>
        <td id="LC5495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we must reconcile ourselves to the fact that we have no case at present,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5496"></td>
        <td id="LC5496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that it is worth our while to run any risk in order to establish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5497"></td>
        <td id="LC5497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5498"></td>
        <td id="LC5498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5499"></td>
        <td id="LC5499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And how do you propose to do so?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5500"></td>
        <td id="LC5500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5501"></td>
        <td id="LC5501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have great hopes of what Mrs. Laura Lyons may do for us when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5502"></td>
        <td id="LC5502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">position of affairs is made clear to her. And I have my own plan as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5503"></td>
        <td id="LC5503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well. Sufficient for tomorrow is the evil thereof; but I hope before the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5504"></td>
        <td id="LC5504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">day is past to have the upper hand at last.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5505"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5506"></td>
        <td id="LC5506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could draw nothing further from him, and he walked, lost in thought,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5507"></td>
        <td id="LC5507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as far as the Baskerville gates.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5508"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5509"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5510"></td>
        <td id="LC5510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5511"></td>
        <td id="LC5511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes; I see no reason for further concealment. But one last word,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5512"></td>
        <td id="LC5512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Watson. Say nothing of the hound to Sir Henry. Let him think that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5513"></td>
        <td id="LC5513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Selden’s death was as Stapleton would have us believe. He will have a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5514"></td>
        <td id="LC5514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better nerve for the ordeal which he will have to undergo tomorrow,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5515"></td>
        <td id="LC5515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he is engaged, if I remember your report aright, to dine with these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5516"></td>
        <td id="LC5516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5517"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5518"></td>
        <td id="LC5518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And so am I.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5519"></td>
        <td id="LC5519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5520"></td>
        <td id="LC5520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then you must excuse yourself and he must go alone. That will be easily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5521"></td>
        <td id="LC5521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arranged. And now, if we are too late for dinner, I think that we are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5522"></td>
        <td id="LC5522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both ready for our suppers.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5523"></td>
