</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5524"></td>
        <td id="LC5524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sir Henry was more pleased than surprised to see Sherlock Holmes, for he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5525"></td>
        <td id="LC5525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had for some days been expecting that recent events would bring him down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5526"></td>
        <td id="LC5526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from London. He did raise his eyebrows, however, when he found that my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5527"></td>
        <td id="LC5527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friend had neither any luggage nor any explanations for its absence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5528"></td>
        <td id="LC5528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Between us we soon supplied his wants, and then over a belated supper</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5529"></td>
        <td id="LC5529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we explained to the baronet as much of our experience as it seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5530"></td>
        <td id="LC5530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desirable that he should know. But first I had the unpleasant duty of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5531"></td>
        <td id="LC5531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breaking the news to Barrymore and his wife. To him it may have been an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5532"></td>
        <td id="LC5532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unmitigated relief, but she wept bitterly in her apron. To all the world</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5533"></td>
        <td id="LC5533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was the man of violence, half animal and half demon; but to her he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5534"></td>
        <td id="LC5534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always remained the little wilful boy of her own girlhood, the child who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5535"></td>
        <td id="LC5535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had clung to her hand. Evil indeed is the man who has not one woman to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5536"></td>
        <td id="LC5536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mourn him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5537"></td>
        <td id="LC5537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5538"></td>
        <td id="LC5538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I’ve been moping in the house all day since Watson went off in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5539"></td>
        <td id="LC5539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning,” said the baronet. “I guess I should have some credit, for I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5540"></td>

        <td id="L5543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5543"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5544"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5545"></td>
        <td id="LC5545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes drily. “By the way, I don’t suppose you appreciate that we have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5546"></td>
        <td id="LC5546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been mourning over you as having broken your neck?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5547"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5548"></td>
        <td id="LC5548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sir Henry opened his eyes. “How was that?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5549"></td>
        <td id="LC5549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5550"></td>
        <td id="LC5550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“This poor wretch was dressed in your clothes. I fear your servant who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5551"></td>
        <td id="LC5551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave them to him may get into trouble with the police.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5552"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5553"></td>
        <td id="LC5553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That is unlikely. There was no mark on any of them, as far as I know.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5554"></td>
        <td id="LC5554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5555"></td>
        <td id="LC5555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That’s lucky for him--in fact, it’s lucky for all of you, since you are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5556"></td>
        <td id="LC5556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all on the wrong side of the law in this matter. I am not sure that as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5557"></td>
        <td id="LC5557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a conscientious detective my first duty is not to arrest the whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5558"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5559"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5560"></td>
        <td id="LC5560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But how about the case?” asked the baronet. “Have you made anything out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5561"></td>
        <td id="LC5561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the tangle? I don’t know that Watson and I are much the wiser since</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5562"></td>
        <td id="LC5562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we came down.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5563"></td>
        <td id="LC5563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5564"></td>
        <td id="LC5564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I think that I shall be in a position to make the situation rather more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5565"></td>
        <td id="LC5565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clear to you before long. It has been an exceedingly difficult and most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5566"></td>
        <td id="LC5566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complicated business. There are several points upon which we still want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5567"></td>
        <td id="LC5567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light--but it is coming all the same.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5568"></td>
        <td id="LC5568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5569"></td>
        <td id="LC5569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We’ve had one experience, as Watson has no doubt told you. We heard the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5570"></td>
        <td id="LC5570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hound on the moor, so I can swear that it is not all empty superstition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5571"></td>
        <td id="LC5571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had something to do with dogs when I was out West, and I know one when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5572"></td>
        <td id="LC5572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I hear one. If you can muzzle that one and put him on a chain I’ll be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5573"></td>
        <td id="LC5573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ready to swear you are the greatest detective of all time.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5574"></td>
        <td id="LC5574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5575"></td>
        <td id="LC5575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I think I will muzzle him and chain him all right if you will give me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5576"></td>
        <td id="LC5576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your help.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5577"></td>
        <td id="LC5577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5578"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5674"></td>
        <td id="LC5674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5675"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5677"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5678"></td>
        <td id="LC5678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both physical and spiritual. A study of family portraits is enough</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5679"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC5767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your trap, however, and let them know that you intend to walk home.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5768"></td>
        <td id="LC5768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5769"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5961"></td>
        <td id="LC5961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we need think of starting. I think we might employ it in getting some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5962"></td>
        <td id="LC5962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dinner and then, Lestrade, we will take the London fog out of your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5963"></td>
        <td id="LC5963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throat by giving you a breath of the pure night air of Dartmoor. Never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5964"></td>
        <td id="LC5964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been there? Ah, well, I don’t suppose you will forget your first visit.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5965"></td>
        <td id="LC5965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5966"></td>
        <td id="LC5966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5967"></td>
        <td id="LC5967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5968"></td>
        <td id="LC5968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5969"></td>
        <td id="LC5969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One of Sherlock Holmes’s defects--if, indeed, one may call it a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5970"></td>
        <td id="LC5970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">defect--was that he was exceedingly loath to communicate his full plans</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5971"></td>
        <td id="LC5971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to any other person until the instant of their fulfilment. Partly it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5972"></td>
        <td id="LC5972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came no doubt from his own masterful nature, which loved to dominate and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5973"></td>
        <td id="LC5973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surprise those who were around him. Partly also from his professional</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5974"></td>
        <td id="LC5974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">caution, which urged him never to take any chances. The result, however,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5975"></td>
        <td id="LC5975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was very trying for those who were acting as his agents and assistants.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5976"></td>
        <td id="LC5976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had often suffered under it, but never more so than during that long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5977"></td>
        <td id="LC5977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drive in the darkness. The great ordeal was in front of us; at last we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5978"></td>
        <td id="LC5978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were about to make our final effort, and yet Holmes had said nothing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5979"></td>
        <td id="LC5979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I could only surmise what his course of action would be. My nerves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5980"></td>
        <td id="LC5980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thrilled with anticipation when at last the cold wind upon our faces and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5981"></td>
        <td id="LC5981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dark, void spaces on either side of the narrow road told me that we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5982"></td>
        <td id="LC5982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were back upon the moor once again. Every stride of the horses and every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5983"></td>
        <td id="LC5983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn of the wheels was taking us nearer to our supreme adventure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5984"></td>
        <td id="LC5984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5985"></td>
        <td id="LC5985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Our conversation was hampered by the presence of the driver of the hired</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC5986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wagonette, so that we were forced to talk of trivial matters when our</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6022"></td>
        <td id="LC6022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, we shall make our little ambush here. Get into this hollow,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6023"></td>
        <td id="LC6023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lestrade. You have been inside the house, have you not, Watson? Can you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6024"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L6037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6037"></td>

        <td id="L6039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6039"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC6044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Stapleton was talking with animation, but the baronet looked pale and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6045"></td>
        <td id="LC6045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distrait. Perhaps the thought of that lonely walk across the ill-omened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6046"></td>
        <td id="LC6046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moor was weighing heavily upon his mind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6047"></td>
        <td id="LC6047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6048"></td>
        <td id="LC6048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As I watched them Stapleton rose and left the room, while Sir Henry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6049"></td>
        <td id="LC6049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">filled his glass again and leaned back in his chair, puffing at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6050"></td>
        <td id="LC6050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cigar. I heard the creak of a door and the crisp sound of boots upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6051"></td>
        <td id="LC6051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gravel. The steps passed along the path on the other side of the wall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6052"></td>
        <td id="LC6052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under which I crouched. Looking over, I saw the naturalist pause at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6053"></td>
        <td id="LC6053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door of an out-house in the corner of the orchard. A key turned in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6054"></td>
        <td id="LC6054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a lock, and as he passed in there was a curious scuffling noise from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6055"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6146"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6148"></td>
        <td id="LC6148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes glowed with a smouldering glare, its muzzle and hackles and dewlap</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6149"></td>
        <td id="LC6149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were outlined in flickering flame. Never in the delirious dream of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6150"></td>
        <td id="LC6150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a disordered brain could anything more savage, more appalling, more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6151"></td>
        <td id="LC6151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hellish be conceived than that dark form and savage face which broke</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6152"></td>
        <td id="LC6152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon us out of the wall of fog.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6153"></td>
        <td id="LC6153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6154"></td>
        <td id="LC6154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With long bounds the huge black creature was leaping down the track,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6155"></td>
        <td id="LC6155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">following hard upon the footsteps of our friend. So paralyzed were we by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6156"></td>
        <td id="LC6156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the apparition that we allowed him to pass before we had recovered our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6157"></td>
        <td id="LC6157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nerve. Then Holmes and I both fired together, and the creature gave a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6158"></td>
        <td id="LC6158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hideous howl, which showed that one at least had hit him. He did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6159"></td>
        <td id="LC6159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pause, however, but bounded onward. Far away on the path we saw Sir</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6160"></td>
        <td id="LC6160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Henry looking back, his face white in the moonlight, his hands raised in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6161"></td>
        <td id="LC6161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horror, glaring helplessly at the frightful thing which was hunting him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6162"></td>
        <td id="LC6162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down. But that cry of pain from the hound had blown all our fears to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6163"></td>
        <td id="LC6163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">winds. If he was vulnerable he was mortal, and if we could wound him we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6164"></td>
        <td id="LC6164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could kill him. Never have I seen a man run as Holmes ran that night. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6165"></td>
        <td id="LC6165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am reckoned fleet of foot, but he outpaced me as much as I outpaced the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6166"></td>
        <td id="LC6166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little professional. In front of us as we flew up the track we heard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6167"></td>
        <td id="LC6167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scream after scream from Sir Henry and the deep roar of the hound. I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6168"></td>
        <td id="LC6168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in time to see the beast spring upon its victim, hurl him to the ground,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6169"></td>
        <td id="LC6169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and worry at his throat. But the next instant Holmes had emptied five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6170"></td>
        <td id="LC6170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">barrels of his revolver into the creature’s flank. With a last howl of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6171"></td>
        <td id="LC6171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agony and a vicious snap in the air, it rolled upon its back, four feet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6172"></td>
        <td id="LC6172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pawing furiously, and then fell limp upon its side. I stooped, panting,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6173"></td>
        <td id="LC6173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and pressed my pistol to the dreadful, shimmering head, but it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6174"></td>
        <td id="LC6174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">useless to press the trigger. The giant hound was dead.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6175"></td>
        <td id="LC6175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6176"></td>
        <td id="LC6176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sir Henry lay insensible where he had fallen. We tore away his collar,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6177"></td>
        <td id="LC6177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Holmes breathed a prayer of gratitude when we saw that there was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6178"></td>
        <td id="LC6178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no sign of a wound and that the rescue had been in time. Already our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6179"></td>
        <td id="LC6179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friend’s eyelids shivered and he made a feeble effort to move. Lestrade</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6180"></td>
        <td id="LC6180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thrust his brandy-flask between the baronet’s teeth, and two frightened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6181"></td>
        <td id="LC6181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes were looking up at us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6182"></td>
        <td id="LC6182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6183"></td>
        <td id="LC6183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My God!” he whispered. “What was it? What, in heaven’s name, was it?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6184"></td>
        <td id="LC6184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6185"></td>
        <td id="LC6185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s dead, whatever it is,” said Holmes. “We’ve laid the family ghost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6186"></td>
        <td id="LC6186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once and forever.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6187"></td>
        <td id="LC6187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6188"></td>
        <td id="LC6188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In mere size and strength it was a terrible creature which was lying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6189"></td>
        <td id="LC6189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stretched before us. It was not a pure bloodhound and it was not a pure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6190"></td>
        <td id="LC6190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mastiff; but it appeared to be a combination of the two--gaunt, savage,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6191"></td>
        <td id="LC6191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and as large as a small lioness. Even now in the stillness of death,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6192"></td>
        <td id="LC6192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the huge jaws seemed to be dripping with a bluish flame and the small,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6193"></td>
        <td id="LC6193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deep-set, cruel eyes were ringed with fire. I placed my hand upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6194"></td>
        <td id="LC6194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glowing muzzle, and as I held them up my own fingers smouldered and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6195"></td>
        <td id="LC6195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gleamed in the darkness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6196"></td>
        <td id="LC6196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6197"></td>
        <td id="LC6197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Phosphorus,” I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6198"></td>
        <td id="LC6198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6199"></td>
        <td id="LC6199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“A cunning preparation of it,” said Holmes, sniffing at the dead animal.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6200"></td>
        <td id="LC6200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There is no smell which might have interfered with his power of scent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6201"></td>
        <td id="LC6201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We owe you a deep apology, Sir Henry, for having exposed you to this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6202"></td>
        <td id="LC6202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fright. I was prepared for a hound, but not for such a creature as this.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6203"></td>
        <td id="LC6203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And the fog gave us little time to receive him.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6204"></td>
        <td id="LC6204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6205"></td>
        <td id="LC6205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You have saved my life.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6206"></td>
        <td id="LC6206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6207"></td>
        <td id="LC6207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Having first endangered it. Are you strong enough to stand?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6208"></td>
        <td id="LC6208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6209"></td>
        <td id="LC6209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Give me another mouthful of that brandy and I shall be ready for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6210"></td>
        <td id="LC6210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything. So! Now, if you will help me up. What do you propose to do?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6211"></td>
        <td id="LC6211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6212"></td>
        <td id="LC6212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“To leave you here. You are not fit for further adventures tonight. If</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6213"></td>
        <td id="LC6213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you will wait, one or other of us will go back with you to the Hall.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6214"></td>
        <td id="LC6214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6215"></td>
        <td id="LC6215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He tried to stagger to his feet; but he was still ghastly pale and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6216"></td>
        <td id="LC6216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trembling in every limb. We helped him to a rock, where he sat shivering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6217"></td>
        <td id="LC6217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his face buried in his hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6218"></td>
        <td id="LC6218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6219"></td>
        <td id="LC6219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We must leave you now,” said Holmes. “The rest of our work must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6220"></td>
        <td id="LC6220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done, and every moment is of importance. We have our case, and now we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6221"></td>
        <td id="LC6221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only want our man.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6222"></td>
        <td id="LC6222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6223"></td>
        <td id="LC6223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s a thousand to one against our finding him at the house,” he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6224"></td>
        <td id="LC6224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continued as we retraced our steps swiftly down the path. “Those shots</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6225"></td>
        <td id="LC6225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must have told him that the game was up.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6226"></td>
        <td id="LC6226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6227"></td>
        <td id="LC6227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We were some distance off, and this fog may have deadened them.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6228"></td>
        <td id="LC6228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6229"></td>
        <td id="LC6229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He followed the hound to call him off--of that you may be certain. No,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6230"></td>
        <td id="LC6230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no, he’s gone by this time! But we’ll search the house and make sure.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6231"></td>
        <td id="LC6231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6232"></td>
        <td id="LC6232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The front door was open, so we rushed in and hurried from room to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6233"></td>
        <td id="LC6233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room to the amazement of a doddering old manservant, who met us in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6234"></td>
        <td id="LC6234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passage. There was no light save in the dining-room, but Holmes caught</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6235"></td>
        <td id="LC6235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up the lamp and left no corner of the house unexplored. No sign could we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6236"></td>
        <td id="LC6236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see of the man whom we were chasing. On the upper floor, however, one of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6237"></td>
        <td id="LC6237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bedroom doors was locked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6238"></td>
        <td id="LC6238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6239"></td>
        <td id="LC6239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There’s someone in here,” cried Lestrade. “I can hear a movement. Open</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6240"></td>
        <td id="LC6240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this door!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6241"></td>
        <td id="LC6241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6242"></td>
        <td id="LC6242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A faint moaning and rustling came from within. Holmes struck the door</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6243"></td>
        <td id="LC6243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just over the lock with the flat of his foot and it flew open. Pistol in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6335"></td>
        <td id="LC6335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on her husband’s track. We left her standing upon the thin peninsula of</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L6489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6489"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6498"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6500"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6508"></td>
        <td id="LC6508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6509"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6510"></td>
        <td id="LC6510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But it was some time coming. The old gentleman could not be decoyed</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6513"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6514"></td>
        <td id="LC6514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the demon dog received a new confirmation. He had hoped that his wife</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6515"></td>
        <td id="LC6515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might lure Sir Charles to his ruin, but here she proved unexpectedly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6516"></td>
        <td id="LC6516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">independent. She would not endeavour to entangle the old gentleman in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6517"></td>
        <td id="LC6517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a sentimental attachment which might deliver him over to his enemy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6518"></td>
        <td id="LC6518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Threats and even, I am sorry to say, blows refused to move her. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6519"></td>
        <td id="LC6519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would have nothing to do with it, and for a time Stapleton was at a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6520"></td>
        <td id="LC6520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deadlock.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6521"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6522"></td>
        <td id="LC6522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He found a way out of his difficulties through the chance that Sir</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6523"></td>
        <td id="LC6523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Charles, who had conceived a friendship for him, made him the minister</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6524"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6525"></td>
        <td id="LC6525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By representing himself as a single man he acquired complete influence</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6526"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6535"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6536"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6537"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6539"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6563"></td>

        <td id="L6569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6569"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6578"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6590"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6591"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6599"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6603"></td>
        <td id="LC6603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">point which appears to complicate a case is, when duly considered and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6604"></td>
        <td id="LC6604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scientifically handled, the one which is most likely to elucidate it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6605"></td>
        <td id="LC6605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6606"></td>
        <td id="LC6606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then we had the visit from our friends next morning, shadowed always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6607"></td>
        <td id="LC6607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by Stapleton in the cab. From his knowledge of our rooms and of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6608"></td>
        <td id="LC6608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appearance, as well as from his general conduct, I am inclined to think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6609"></td>
        <td id="LC6609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Stapleton’s career of crime has been by no means limited to this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6610"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6702"></td>
        <td id="LC6702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It only remains to indicate the part which she had played throughout.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6703"></td>
        <td id="LC6703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There can be no doubt that Stapleton exercised an influence over her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6704"></td>
        <td id="LC6704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which may have been love or may have been fear, or very possibly both,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6705"></td>
        <td id="LC6705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since they are by no means incompatible emotions. It was, at least,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6706"></td>
        <td id="LC6706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absolutely effective. At his command she consented to pass as his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6707"></td>
        <td id="LC6707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sister, though he found the limits of his power over her when he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6708"></td>
        <td id="LC6708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endeavoured to make her the direct accessory to murder. She was ready to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6709"></td>
        <td id="LC6709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warn Sir Henry so far as she could without implicating her husband, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6710"></td>
        <td id="LC6710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again and again she tried to do so. Stapleton himself seems to have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6711"></td>
        <td id="LC6711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">capable of jealousy, and when he saw the baronet paying court to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6712"></td>
        <td id="LC6712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lady, even though it was part of his own plan, still he could not help</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6713"></td>
        <td id="LC6713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interrupting with a passionate outburst which revealed the fiery soul</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6714"></td>
        <td id="LC6714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which his self-contained manner so cleverly concealed. By encouraging</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6715"></td>
        <td id="LC6715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the intimacy he made it certain that Sir Henry would frequently come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6716"></td>
        <td id="LC6716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Merripit House and that he would sooner or later get the opportunity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6717"></td>
        <td id="LC6717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he desired. On the day of the crisis, however, his wife turned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6718"></td>
        <td id="LC6718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suddenly against him. She had learned something of the death of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6719"></td>
        <td id="LC6719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">convict, and she knew that the hound was being kept in the outhouse on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6720"></td>
        <td id="LC6720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the evening that Sir Henry was coming to dinner. She taxed her husband</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6721"></td>
        <td id="LC6721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his intended crime, and a furious scene followed in which he showed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6722"></td>
        <td id="LC6722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her for the first time that she had a rival in his love. Her fidelity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6723"></td>
        <td id="LC6723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned in an instant to bitter hatred, and he saw that she would betray</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6724"></td>
        <td id="LC6724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. He tied her up, therefore, that she might have no chance of warning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6725"></td>
        <td id="LC6725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sir Henry, and he hoped, no doubt, that when the whole countryside put</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6726"></td>
        <td id="LC6726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down the baronet’s death to the curse of his family, as they certainly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6727"></td>
        <td id="LC6727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would do, he could win his wife back to accept an accomplished fact and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6728"></td>
        <td id="LC6728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to keep silent upon what she knew. In this I fancy that in any case</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6729"></td>
        <td id="LC6729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he made a miscalculation, and that, if we had not been there, his doom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6730"></td>
        <td id="LC6730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would none the less have been sealed. A woman of Spanish blood does</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6731"></td>
        <td id="LC6731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not condone such an injury so lightly. And now, my dear Watson, without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6732"></td>
        <td id="LC6732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">referring to my notes, I cannot give you a more detailed account of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6733"></td>
        <td id="LC6733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this curious case. I do not know that anything essential has been left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6734"></td>
        <td id="LC6734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unexplained.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6735"></td>
        <td id="LC6735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6736"></td>
        <td id="LC6736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He could not hope to frighten Sir Henry to death as he had done the old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6737"></td>
        <td id="LC6737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uncle with his bogie hound.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6738"></td>
        <td id="LC6738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6739"></td>
        <td id="LC6739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The beast was savage and half-starved. If its appearance did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6740"></td>
        <td id="LC6740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frighten its victim to death, at least it would paralyze the resistance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6741"></td>
        <td id="LC6741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which might be offered.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6742"></td>
        <td id="LC6742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6743"></td>
        <td id="LC6743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No doubt. There only remains one difficulty. If Stapleton came into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6744"></td>
        <td id="LC6744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">succession, how could he explain the fact that he, the heir, had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6745"></td>
        <td id="LC6745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">living unannounced under another name so close to the property? How</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6746"></td>
        <td id="LC6746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could he claim it without causing suspicion and inquiry?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6747"></td>
        <td id="LC6747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6748"></td>
        <td id="LC6748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is a formidable difficulty, and I fear that you ask too much when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6749"></td>
        <td id="LC6749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you expect me to solve it. The past and the present are within the field</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6750"></td>
        <td id="LC6750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my inquiry, but what a man may do in the future is a hard question</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6751"></td>
        <td id="LC6751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to answer. Mrs. Stapleton has heard her husband discuss the problem on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6752"></td>
        <td id="LC6752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several occasions. There were three possible courses. He might claim the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6753"></td>
        <td id="LC6753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">property from South America, establish his identity before the British</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6754"></td>
        <td id="LC6754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">authorities there and so obtain the fortune without ever coming to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6755"></td>
        <td id="LC6755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">England at all, or he might adopt an elaborate disguise during the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6756"></td>
        <td id="LC6756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">short time that he need be in London; or, again, he might furnish an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6757"></td>
        <td id="LC6757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accomplice with the proofs and papers, putting him in as heir, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6758"></td>
        <td id="LC6758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">retaining a claim upon some proportion of his income. We cannot doubt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6759"></td>
        <td id="LC6759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from what we know of him that he would have found some way out of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6760"></td>
        <td id="LC6760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficulty. And now, my dear Watson, we have had some weeks of severe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6761"></td>
        <td id="LC6761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work, and for one evening, I think, we may turn our thoughts into more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6762"></td>
        <td id="LC6762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasant channels. I have a box for ‘Les Huguenots.’ Have you heard the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6763"></td>
        <td id="LC6763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">De Reszkes? Might I trouble you then to be ready in half an hour, and we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6764"></td>
        <td id="LC6764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can stop at Marcini’s for a little dinner on the way?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6765"></td>
        <td id="LC6765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6766"></td>
        <td id="LC6766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6767"></td>
        <td id="LC6767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6768"></td>
        <td id="LC6768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6769"></td>

      </tr>
